68  // Scan Duration formula
69  // 60 * (2 ^ n + 1) symbols, where one symbol equals 16us
70  #define SCAN_DURATION_0 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(120)
71  #define SCAN_DURATION_1 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(180)
72  #define SCAN_DURATION_2 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(300)
73  #define SCAN_DURATION_3 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(540)
74  #define SCAN_DURATION_4 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(1020)
75  #define SCAN_DURATION_5 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(1980)
76  #define SCAN_DURATION_6 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(3900)
77  #define SCAN_DURATION_7 SYMBOLS_TO_TICKS(7740)

331  /******************************************************************/
332  // C18 compiler cannot optimize the code with a macro. Instead of
333  // calling macro Nop in a big function, we define a wrapper to call
334  // Nop in order to be able to optimize the code efficiently.
335  /******************************************************************/
336  void MacroNop(void)
337  {
338  Nop();
339  }
340 
341  #if !defined(TARGET_SMALL)
342  /******************************************************************/
343  // Function: void BroadcastJitter(BYTE range)
344  //
345  // PreCondition: None
346  //
347  // Input: range - The range of random delay in milli
348  // second.
349  //
350  // Output: None
351  //
352  // Side Effect: A random delay between 0 to range in milli
353  // second
354  //
355  // Overview: This function introduce a random delay between
356  // 0 to range in millisecond. This delay helps
357  // multiple devices to rebroadcast the message
358  // at different time, thus lower the possibility
359  // of packet collision in rebroadcast.
360  /******************************************************************/
361  void BroadcastJitter(BYTE range)
362  {
363  BYTE jitter = TMRL % range;
364  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
365 
366  while( jitter > 0 )
367  {
368  jitter--;
369  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
370  while(1)
371  {
372  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
373  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > ONE_MILI_SECOND )
374  {
375  break;
376  }
377  }
378  }
379  }
380  #endif
381 
382  /*********************************************************************
383  * Function: void MiWiPROTasks( void )
384  *
385  * PreCondition: None
386  *
387  * Input: None
388  *
389  * Output: None
390  *
391  * Side Effects: The stack receives, handles, buffers, and transmits
392  * packets. It also handles all of the joining
393  *
394  * Overview: This function maintains the operation of the stack
395  * It should be called as often as possible.
396  ********************************************************************/
397  void MiWiPROTasks(void)
398  {
399  BYTE i;
400  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
401 
402  if( MiMAC_ReceivedPacket() )
403  {
404  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.RxHasUserData )
405  {
406  return;
407  }
408 
409  rxMessage.flags.Val = 0;
410  rxMessage.flags.bits.broadcast = MACRxPacket.flags.bits.broadcast;
411  rxMessage.flags.bits.secEn = MACRxPacket.flags.bits.secEn;
412  rxMessage.flags.bits.command = (MACRxPacket.flags.bits.packetType == PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND) ? 1:0;
413  rxMessage.flags.bits.srcPrsnt = MACRxPacket.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt;
414  if( MACRxPacket.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt )
415  {
416  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
417  rxMessage.flags.bits.altSrcAddr = MACRxPacket.altSourceAddress;
418  #else
419  rxMessage.flags.bits.altSrcAddr = 1;
420  #endif
421  rxMessage.SourceAddress = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress;
422  }
423  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
424  rxMessage.SourcePANID.Val = MACRxPacket.SourcePANID.Val;
425  #endif
426  rxMessage.PacketLQI = MACRxPacket.LQIValue;
427  rxMessage.PacketRSSI = MACRxPacket.RSSIValue;
428 
429  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.RxHasUserData = 0;
430 
431  //determine what type of packet it is.
432  switch(MACRxPacket.flags.bits.packetType)
433  {
434  //if it is a data packet
435  case PACKET_TYPE_DATA:
436  //The guts of MiWi PRO ...
437  {
438  WORD_VAL destPANID;
439  WORD_VAL sourcePANID;
440  WORD_VAL sourceShortAddress;
441  WORD_VAL destShortAddress;
442 HANDLE_DATA_PACKET:
443  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
444  #if defined(ENABLE_BROADCAST_TO_SLEEP_DEVICE)
445  for(i = 0; i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE; i++)
446  {
447  if( PacketRecords[i].RxCounter > 0)
448  {
449  PacketRecords[i].RxCounter--;
450  }
451  }
452  #endif
453 
454  // If it is just an empty packet, ignore here.
455  if( MACRxPacket.PayloadLen == 0 )
456  {
457  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.DataRequesting = 0;
458  break;
459  }
460  #endif
461 
462  if( MACRxPacket.PayloadLen < 10 )
463  {
464  break;
465  }
466 
467  // Load the source and destination address information.
468  destPANID.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[2];
469  destPANID.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[3];
470  destShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[4];
471  destShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[5];
472  sourcePANID.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[6];
473  sourcePANID.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[7];
474  sourceShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[8];
475  sourceShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[9];
476 
477  //rxMessage.flags.Val = 0;
478  rxMessage.flags.bits.secEn = MACRxPacket.flags.bits.secEn;
479  // if this is a broadcast
480  if(rxMessage.flags.bits.broadcast || destShortAddress.Val > 0xFFFC)
481  {
482  // if this broadcast is from myself
483  if( sourceShortAddress.Val == myShortAddress.Val &&
484  sourcePANID.Val == myPANID.Val )
485  {
486  break;
487  }
488 
489  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_END_DEVICE)
490  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
491  if( destShortAddress.Val != 0xFFFF )
492  {
493  break;
494  }
495  #else
496  if( destShortAddress.Val < 0xFFFE )
497  {
498  break;
499  }
500  #endif
501  #endif
502 
503  //check if this broadcast has been received before
504  for(i = 0; i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE; i++)
505  {
506  if( PacketRecords[i].RxCounter &&
507  PacketRecords[i].AltSourceAddr.Val == sourceShortAddress.Val &&
508  PacketRecords[i].MiWiPROSeq == MACRxPacket.Payload[10] )
509  {
510  break;
511  }
512  }
513 
514  // if the broadcast is already in the broadcast record
515  if( i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE )
516  {
517  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
518  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.DataRequesting = 0;
519  #endif
520  break;
521  }
522 
523 
524  // save the broadcast information into the broadcast record.
525  for(i = 0; i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE; i++)
526  {
527  if( PacketRecords[i].RxCounter == 0 )
528  {
529  break;
530  }
531  }
532 
533  if( i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE )
534  {
535  PacketRecords[i].AltSourceAddr.Val = sourceShortAddress.Val;
536  PacketRecords[i].MiWiPROSeq = MACRxPacket.Payload[10];
537  PacketRecords[i].RxCounter = INDIRECT_MESSAGE_TIMEOUT_CYCLE + 1;
538  #if !defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
539  PacketRecords[i].StartTick = MiWi_TickGet();
540  #endif
541  }
542 
543  if( destShortAddress.Val == 0xFFFF )
544  {
545  rxMessage.flags.bits.broadcast = BROADCAST_TO_ALL;
546  }
547  else if( destShortAddress.Val == 0xFFFE )
548  {
549  rxMessage.flags.bits.broadcast = MULTICAST_TO_FFDS;
550  }
551  else if( destShortAddress.Val == 0xFFFD )
552  {
553  rxMessage.flags.bits.broadcast = MULTICAST_TO_COORDINATORS;
554  }
555 
556  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
557  // Consider to rebroadcast the message
558  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[0]>1)
559  {
560  MACRxPacket.Payload[0]--;
561 
562  if( MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_RANDOM_SEND )
563  {
564  MiMAC_SendPacket(RandomSendInfo.MTP, RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer, RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData);
565  }
566 
567  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData = 0;
568  for(i = 0; i < MACRxPacket.PayloadLen; i++)
569  {
570  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData++] = MACRxPacket.Payload[i];
571  }
572  RandomSendInfo.MTP.flags.Val = MACRxPacket.flags.Val;
573  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
574  RandomSendInfo.MTP.altSrcAddr = MACRxPacket.altSourceAddress;
575  RandomSendInfo.MTP.DestPANID.Val = MACRxPacket.SourcePANID.Val;
576  #endif
577  RandomSendInfo.StartTick = MiWi_TickGet();
578  RandomSendInfo.RandomDelayInMilliSecond = (TMRL % RANDOM_DELAY_RANGE);
579  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_RANDOM_SEND = 1;
580 
581  #if defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)
582  if( (destShortAddress.Val == 0xFFFF) && (MACRxPacket.Payload[0]>1))
583  {
584  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
585  {
586  if( ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid && (ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.RXOnWhenIdle == 0) &&
587  ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isFamily )
588  {
589  break;
590  }
591  }
592  if( i < CONNECTION_SIZE )
593  {
594  BYTE j;
595 
596  MACRxPacket.Payload[0]--;
597 
598  TxData = MACRxPacket.PayloadLen;
599  for(j = 0; j < TxData; j++)
600  {
601  TxBuffer[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[j];
602  }
603  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
604  SaveIndirectMessage(TRUE, destPANID, NULL, FALSE, MACRxPacket.flags.bits.secEn);
605  #else
606  SaveIndirectMessage(TRUE, NULL, FALSE, MACRxPacket.flags.bits.secEn);
607  #endif
608  }
609  }
610  #endif
611  }
612 
613  #endif
614 
615 
616  goto ThisPacketIsForMe;
617  }
618 
619  // this is unicast
620  if((destPANID.Val == myPANID.Val) && (destShortAddress.Val == myShortAddress.Val))
621  {
622  //need to check to see if the MiWi PRO Ack is set
623  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[1] & MIWI_PRO_ACK_REQ)
624  {
625  TxBuffer[0] = defaultHops; //number of hops
626  TxBuffer[1] = 0x02; //Frame Control
627  TxBuffer[2] = sourcePANID.v[0];
628  TxBuffer[3] = sourcePANID.v[1];
629  TxBuffer[4] = sourceShortAddress.v[0];
630  TxBuffer[5] = sourceShortAddress.v[1];
631  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
632  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
633  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
634  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB
635  TxBuffer[10] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-1]; //sequence number
636  TxBuffer[11] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE;
637  TxBuffer[12] = ACK_REPORT_TYPE;
638  TxData = 13;
639 
640  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
641  if( sourceShortAddress.v[1] != myShortAddress.v[1] )
642  {
643  RouteMessage(sourcePANID, sourceShortAddress, FALSE);
644  }
645  else
646  {
647  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
648  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
649 
650  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
651  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
652  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
653  MTP.DestAddress = sourceShortAddress.v;
654  MTP.DestPANID.Val = sourcePANID.Val;
655  #else
656  tempShortAddress.Val = sourceShortAddress.Val;
657  tempPANID.Val = sourcePANID.Val;
658  if( (i = SearchForShortAddress()) != 0xFF )
659  {
660  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
661  }
662  #endif
663 
664  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
665  }
666  #else
667 
668  // for end device, always send the message to its parent
669  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
670  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
671 
672  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
673  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
674  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
675  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v;
676  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
677  #else
678  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].Address;
679  #endif
680 
681  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
682  #endif
683 
684  rxMessage.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
685  }
686 
687 ThisPacketIsForMe:
688  //if the packet is a MiWi PRO stack packet
689  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN] == MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE)
690  {
691  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+1] != ACK_REPORT_TYPE)
692  {
693  //determine which stack report it was
694  switch(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+1])
695  {
696  #if defined(SUPPORT_EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH)
697  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
698  case EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH_REQUEST:
699  {
700  BYTE handle,j;
701  BOOL ItsMe;
702 
703  if(sourceShortAddress.Val == myShortAddress.Val)
704  {
705  if(sourcePANID.Val == myPANID.Val)
706  {
707  //I started this message. I don't need to re-broadcast it.
708  break;
709  }
710  }
711 
712  //copy the address into tempLongAddress
713  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"\r\nEUI address search request\r\n");
714  for(j = 0; j < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; j++)
715  {
716  tempLongAddress[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+j];
717  }
718 
719 
720  ItsMe = TRUE;
721  for(j=0;j<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;j++)
722  {
723  //see if the address in question is my own
724  if(tempLongAddress[j] != myLongAddress[j])
725  {
726  ItsMe = FALSE;
727  break;
728  }
729  }
730 
731  //load up the TX Buffer with the results
732  MiApp_FlushTx();
733  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE); //Report Type
734  MiApp_WriteData(EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH_RESPONSE); //Report ID
735  for(j = 0; j < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; j++)
736  {
737  MiApp_WriteData(tempLongAddress[j]); //Data byte 0
738  }
739 
740  //if it wasn't me
741  if(ItsMe == FALSE)
742  {
743  //search the network table for the device
744  handle = SearchForLongAddress();
745 
746  //if we found the device
747  if(handle!=0xFF)
748  {
749  //check to see if the short address is valid for that device
750  if(networkStatus[handle].bits.shortAddressValid)
751  {
752  //I know the device in question so I will send back a response
753  MiApp_WriteData(networkTable[handle].PANID.v[0]);
754  MiApp_WriteData(networkTable[handle].PANID.v[1]);
755  MiApp_WriteData(networkTable[handle].AltAddress.v[0]);
756  MiApp_WriteData(networkTable[handle].AltAddress.v[1]);
757 
758  //if everything is cool then send the response back
759  RouteMessage(sourcePANID, sourceShortAddress, FALSE);
760  //SendReportByShortAddress(sourcePANID,sourceShortAddress,FALSE);
761  }
762  else
763  {
764  //if we didn't have the short address then we can't
765  //respond to this packet even though we know the long address
766  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"found long address but short address not valid\r\n");
767  //clear out the data I already wrote
768  TxData = 0;
769  }
770 
771  }
772  else
773  {
774  //if we couldn't find the long address of the device then forget it
775  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"couldn't find the device");
776  TxData = 0;
777  }
778  }
779  else
780  {
781  //The node in question is me
782  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myPANID.v[0];
783  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myPANID.v[1];
784  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[0];
785  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[1];
786 
787  //send a response back with my own information
788  RouteMessage(sourcePANID, sourceShortAddress, FALSE);
789  }
790  }
791  break;
792  #endif //COORDINATOR_CAPABLE
793  #endif //SUPPORT_EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH
794 
795 
796  #if defined(SUPPORT_EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH)
797  case EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH_RESPONSE:
798  {
799  //got a response back from the IEEE address search
800  //record all of the information in the packet
801  //long address
802 
803  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.EUISearching = 0;
804  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
805  {
806  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+i];
807  }
808  //PANID and short address
809  tempPANID.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH];
810  tempPANID.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH];
811  tempShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+4+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH];
812  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+5+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH];
813 
814  if( (SearchForLongAddress() == 0xFF) && (SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF ) )
815  {
816  //create a new Status entry for the network table
817  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x8D;
818  if( tempShortAddress.v[0] & 0x80 )
819  {
820  tempNodeStatus.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 0;
821  }
822  if((tempShortAddress.Val == sourceShortAddress.Val)
823  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
824  && (tempPANID.Val == sourcePANID.Val)
825  #endif
826  )
827  {
828  tempNodeStatus.bits.directConnection = 1;
829  }
830  //add the node to the network table
831  i = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
832  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
833  if( i < 0xFF )
834  {
835  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[i]), i);
836  }
837  #endif
838  }
839  }
840  break;
841  #endif
842 
843  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
844  case OPEN_SOCKET_REQUEST:
845  {
846  BYTE j;
847 
848  //if we have a socket request open
849  if(openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen == 0)
850  {
851  //if there isn't a request already open
852  //get the current time and the source address
853  openSocketInfo.socketStart = MiWi_TickGet();
854  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-3];
855  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-2];
856 
857  //copy the long address
858  for(j=0;j<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;j++)
859  {
860  openSocketInfo.LongAddress1[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[j+2+MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN];
861  }
862  //mark a request as open
863  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 1;
864  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 0;
865 
866  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
867  for(j = 0; j < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; j++)
868  {
869  openSocketInfo.AdditionalNodeID1[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+j];
870  }
871  #endif
872  }
873  else
874  {
875  //if there was already a request open
876 
877  if( (MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-3] == openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.v[0]) &&
878  (MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-2] == openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.v[1]))
879  {
880  //if we get a request from the same guy twice,
881  //just throw away the second request
882  //ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"got request from same guy twice\r\n");
883  }
884  else if(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.Val == 0x0000)
885  {
886  //I am the PAN coordinator and I initiated the request so don't send back a response to myself
887  //copy the long and short address from the Rx Buffer
888  for(j=0;j<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;j++)
889  {
890  openSocketInfo.LongAddress2[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+j]; //Data byte
891  tempLongAddress[j] = openSocketInfo.LongAddress2[j];
892  }
893 
894  //save the important information about the node sending
895  //the request
896  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-3];
897  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-2];
898 
899  tempShortAddress.v[0] = openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[0];
900  tempShortAddress.v[1] = openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[1];
901  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
902 
903  //look to see if that device exists in our network table
904  openSocketInfo.socketHandle = SearchForShortAddress();
905 
906  if(openSocketInfo.socketHandle == 0xFF)
907  {
908  //otherwise create it
909  //Family, RxOnWHenIdle, Neighbor/Network, P2P, ShortVal, LongVal, Direct, Valid
910  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x8D;
911  if(tempShortAddress.v[0] & 0x80)
912  {
913  tempNodeStatus.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 0;
914  }
915 
916  openSocketInfo.socketHandle = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
917  if( openSocketInfo.socketHandle < 0xFF )
918  {
919  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
920  for(j = 0; j < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; j++)
921  {
922  ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle].PeerInfo[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+j];
923  }
924  #endif
925  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
926  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle]), openSocketInfo.socketHandle);
927  #endif
928  }
929  }
930 
931 
932  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 1;
933  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 1;
934  }
935  else
936  {
937  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"sending out response\r\n");
938 
939  //we got a match so let's send out the response
940 
941  MiApp_FlushTx();
942  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE); //Report Type
943  MiApp_WriteData(OPEN_SOCKET_RESPONSE); //Report ID
944 
945  //copy the long and short address from the Rx Buffer
946  for(j=0;j<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;j++)
947  {
948  openSocketInfo.LongAddress2[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+j]; //Data byte
949  MiApp_WriteData(openSocketInfo.LongAddress2[j]);
950  }
951 
952  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-3];
953  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-2];
954  /*#if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
955  for(j = 0; j < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; j++)
956  {
957  openSocketInfo.AdditionalNodeID2[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+10+j];
958  }
959  #endif
960  */
961 
962  MiApp_WriteData(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[0]);
963  MiApp_WriteData(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress2.v[1]);
964  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
965  for(j = 0; j < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; j++)
966  {
967  MiApp_WriteData(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+j]);
968  }
969  #endif
970 
971 
972  MiApp_UnicastAddress(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.v, FALSE, FALSE);
973  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 1;
974  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 1;
975  }
976 
977  }
978  }
979  break;
980 
981 
982  case COORDINATOR_REPORT:
983  {
984  if( role == ROLE_PAN_COORDINATOR )
985  {
986  BYTE entry;
987 
988  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2] == COORDINATOR_REPORT_STATUS_JOIN )
989  {
990  //load up the TX Buffer with the results
991  MiApp_FlushTx();
992  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE); //Report Type
993  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_RESPONSE); //Report ID
994  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
995  {
996  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3+i];
997  MiApp_WriteData(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3+i]);
998  }
999  if( (entry = SearchForLongAddress()) == 0xFF )
1000  {
1001 ASSIGN_COORDINATOR_SHORT_ADDRESS:
1002  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
1003  for(i = 1; i < NUM_COORDINATOR; i++)
1004  {
1005  tempShortAddress.v[1] = i;
1006  if( (entry = SearchForShortAddress()) == 0xFF )
1007  {
1008  break;
1009  }
1010  }
1011 
1012  if( i < NUM_COORDINATOR )
1013  {
1014  // update family tree
1015  FamilyTree[i] = sourceShortAddress.v[1];
1016  MiApp_WriteData(i);
1017 
1018  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x9D;
1019  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1020  entry = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
1021 
1022  if( entry < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1023  {
1024  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1025  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
1026  {
1027  ConnectionTable[entry].PeerInfo[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[14+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+i];
1028  }
1029  #endif
1030  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
1031  if( entry < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1032  {
1033  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[entry]), entry);
1034  }
1035  #endif
1036  }
1037  else
1038  {
1039  FamilyTree[i] = 0xFF;
1040  MiApp_WriteData(0xFF);
1041  }
1042 
1043  }
1044  else
1045  {
1046  // no more Coordinator available. Use 0xFF
1047  // to indicate that the joining device must
1048  // be an end device
1049  MiApp_WriteData(0xFF);
1050  }
1051  }
1052  else
1053  {
1054  if( ConnectionTable[entry].AltAddress.v[0] == 0 )
1055  {
1056  // check the loop in family tree
1057  BYTE loopCheckTarget = sourceShortAddress.v[1];
1058 
1059  while( loopCheckTarget )
1060  {
1061  if( FamilyTree[loopCheckTarget] == ConnectionTable[entry].AltAddress.v[1] )
1062  {
1063  // potential parent is the children of joining coordinator
1064  // under current topology
1065  break;
1066  }
1067  loopCheckTarget = FamilyTree[loopCheckTarget];
1068  }
1069 
1070  if( loopCheckTarget == 0 )
1071  {
1072  FamilyTree[ConnectionTable[entry].AltAddress.v[1]] = sourceShortAddress.v[1];
1073  }
1074  MiApp_WriteData( ConnectionTable[entry].AltAddress.v[1] );
1075  }
1076  else
1077  {
1078  ConnectionTable[entry].status.Val = 0;
1079  goto ASSIGN_COORDINATOR_SHORT_ADDRESS;
1080  }
1081  }
1082 
1083  MiApp_UnicastAddress(sourceShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
1084 
1085  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_FAMILY_TREE = FAMILY_TREE_BROADCAST;
1086  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1087  backgroundTaskTick.Val -= (ONE_SECOND/2);
1088 
1089  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveFamilyTree = 1;
1090  }
1091  else
1092  {
1093  // Coordinator report status leave
1094  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
1095  {
1096  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3+i];
1097  }
1098  if( (entry = SearchForLongAddress()) != 0xFF )
1099  {
1100  // remove all its children coordinators
1101  for(i = (NUM_COORDINATOR-1); i > 0; i--)
1102  {
1103  BYTE index;
1104  BYTE loopCheck;
1105 
1106  index = i;
1107  loopCheck = 0;
1108  while(index > 0)
1109  {
1110  if( FamilyTree[index] == 0xFF )
1111  {
1112  break;
1113  }
1114 
1115  if( FamilyTree[index] == ConnectionTable[entry].AltAddress.v[1] )
1116  {
1117  BYTE entry2;
1118 
1119  FamilyTree[i] = 0xFF;
1120  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
1121  tempShortAddress.v[1] = i;
1122  if( (entry2 = SearchForShortAddress()) != 0xFF )
1123  {
1124  ConnectionTable[entry2].status.Val = 0;
1125  }
1126  break;
1127  }
1128 
1129  index = FamilyTree[index];
1130  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
1131  {
1132  break;
1133  }
1134  }
1135  }
1136 
1137  FamilyTree[ConnectionTable[entry].AltAddress.v[1]] = 0xFF;
1138  ConnectionTable[entry].status.Val = 0;
1139  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
1140  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[entry]), entry);
1141  #endif
1142 
1143  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_FAMILY_TREE = FAMILY_TREE_BROADCAST;
1144  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1145  backgroundTaskTick.Val -= (ONE_SECOND/2);
1146  }
1147 
1148  }
1149  }
1150  }
1151  break;
1152 
1153 
1154  case COORDINATOR_RESPONSE:
1155  {
1156  BYTE handle;
1157  BYTE entry;
1158  BYTE associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_SUCCESSFUL;
1159 
1160  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
1161  {
1162  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+i];
1163  }
1164  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0xBF;
1165 
1166  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH] == 0xFF )
1167  {
1168  // PAN Coord has run out of Coordinators, assign
1169  // this device as end device
1170  handle = SearchForLongAddress();
1171  if( handle < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1172  {
1173  tempShortAddress.v[1] = myShortAddress.v[1];
1174  entry = 1;
1175  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
1176  {
1177  tempShortAddress.v[0] = entry;
1178  if( SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF )
1179  {
1180  tempShortAddress.v[0] = entry + 0x80;
1181  if( SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF )
1182  {
1183  break;
1184  }
1185  }
1186  entry++;
1187  }
1188  if( i < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1189  {
1190  if( entry < 128 )
1191  {
1192  tempShortAddress.v[0] = entry;
1193  }
1194  else
1195  {
1196  associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_PAN_FULL;
1197  }
1198  }
1199  }
1200  else
1201  {
1202  break;
1203  }
1204  }
1205  else
1206  {
1207  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
1208  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH];
1209  }
1210 
1211  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1212  handle = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
1213 
1214  // send back the association response
1215  TxBuffer[0] = MAC_COMMAND_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
1216  TxBuffer[1] = tempShortAddress.v[0];
1217  TxBuffer[2] = tempShortAddress.v[1];
1218  TxBuffer[3] = associateStatus;
1219  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1220  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
1221  {
1222  TxBuffer[4+i] = AdditionalNodeID[i];
1223  }
1224  #endif
1225  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1226  TxData = 4+ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE;
1227  #else
1228  TxBuffer[4+ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE] = myShortAddress.v[1];
1229  TxData = 5 + ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE;
1230  #endif
1231 
1232  #if defined(ENABLE_SECURITY)
1233  IncomingFrameCounter[handle].Val = 0;
1234  #endif
1235 
1236  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1237  SendMACPacket(myPANID.v, ConnectionTable[handle].Address, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND, 0);
1238  #else
1239  SendMACPacket(ConnectionTable[handle].Address, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND);
1240  #endif
1241 
1242  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
1243  if( handle < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1244  {
1245  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[handle]), handle);
1246  }
1247  #endif
1248  }
1249  break;
1250 
1251 
1252  case FAMILY_TREE_REQUEST:
1253  {
1254  MiApp_FlushTx();
1255  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE);
1256  MiApp_WriteData(FAMILY_TREE_REPORT);
1257  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR; i++)
1258  {
1259  MiApp_WriteData(FamilyTree[i]);
1260  }
1261  MiApp_UnicastAddress(sourceShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
1262  }
1263  break;
1264 
1265 
1266  case FAMILY_TREE_REPORT:
1267  {
1268  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR; i++)
1269  {
1270  FamilyTree[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+i];
1271  }
1272 
1273  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1274  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
1275  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveFamilyTree = 1;
1276  #endif
1277  }
1278  break;
1279 
1280 
1281  case ROUTING_TABLE_REPORT:
1282  {
1283  if( MACRxPacket.RSSIValue > COMM_RSSI_THRESHOLD )
1284  {
1285  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1286  BYTE index = MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2;
1287  #else
1288  BYTE index = MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3;
1289  #endif
1290  BYTE initiator = MACRxPacket.Payload[index];
1291 
1292  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR/8; i++)
1293  {
1294  #if defined(ENABLE_ROUTING_UPDATE)
1295  if( NeighborRoutingTable[sourceShortAddress.v[1]][i] != MACRxPacket.Payload[index+1+i] )
1296  {
1297  NeighborRoutingTable[sourceShortAddress.v[1]][i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[index+1+i];
1298  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveNeighborTable = 1;
1299  }
1300  #else
1301  NeighborRoutingTable[sourceShortAddress.v[1]][i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[index+1+i];
1302  #endif
1303  }
1304  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1305  #if defined(ENABLE_ROUTING_UPDATE)
1306  if( (RoutingTable[ MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1]/8] & (0x01 << (MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1]%8))) == 0 )
1307  {
1308  RoutingTable[ MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1]/8] |= (0x01 << (MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1]%8));
1309  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveRoutingTable = 1;
1310  }
1311  #else
1312  RoutingTable[ MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1]/8] |= (0x01 << (MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1]%8));
1313  #endif
1314 
1315  if( initiator == MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1] )
1316  #else
1317  #if defined(ENABLE_ROUTING_UPDATE)
1318  if( (RoutingTable[sourceShortAddress.v[1]/8] & (0x01 << (MACRxPacket.Payload[index-1]%8))) == 0 )
1319  {
1320  RoutingTable[sourceShortAddress.v[1]/8] |= (0x01 << (MACRxPacket.Payload[index-1]%8));
1321  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveRoutingTable = 1;
1322  }
1323  #else
1324  RoutingTable[sourceShortAddress.v[1]/8] |= (0x01 << (MACRxPacket.Payload[index-1]%8));
1325  #endif
1326 
1327  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
1328  {
1329  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[i];
1330  }
1331  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
1332  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[index-1];
1333  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x8F;
1334  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1335 
1336  if( (i = SearchForLongAddress()) < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1337  {
1338  if( ConnectionTable[i].AltAddress.Val != tempShortAddress.Val )
1339  {
1340  ConnectionTable[i].AltAddress.Val = tempShortAddress.Val;
1341  ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.shortAddressValid = 1;
1342  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveConnectionTable = 1;
1343  }
1344  ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.directConnection = 1;
1345  }
1346  else
1347  {
1348  if( AddNodeToNetworkTable() < CONNECTION_SIZE )
1349  {
1350  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveConnectionTable = 1;
1351  }
1352  }
1353 
1354  if( initiator == MACRxPacket.Payload[index-1] )
1355  #endif
1356  {
1357  // broadcast my routing table
1358  if( MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_RANDOM_SEND )
1359  {
1360  MiMAC_SendPacket(RandomSendInfo.MTP, RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer, RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData);
1361  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_RANDOM_SEND = 0;
1362  }
1363 
1364  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[0] = 1;
1365  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[1] = 0x02;
1366  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[2] = myPANID.v[0];
1367  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[3] = myPANID.v[1];
1368  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[4] = 0xFD;
1369  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[5] = 0xFF;
1370  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0];
1371  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1];
1372  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0];
1373  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1];
1374  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[10] = MiWiPROSeqNum++;
1375  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[11] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE;
1376  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[12] = ROUTING_TABLE_REPORT;
1377  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData = 13;
1378  #if !defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1379  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData++] = myShortAddress.v[1];
1380  #endif
1381  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData++] = initiator;
1382  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR/8; i++)
1383  {
1384  RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxBuffer[RandomSendInfo.RandomSendTxData++] = RoutingTable[i];
1385  }
1386  RandomSendInfo.MTP.flags.Val = 0;
1387  RandomSendInfo.MTP.flags.bits.broadcast = 1;
1388  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1389  RandomSendInfo.MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
1390  RandomSendInfo.MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1391  #else
1392  RandomSendInfo.MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
1393  #endif
1394  RandomSendInfo.RandomDelayInMilliSecond = (TMRL % RANDOM_DELAY_RANGE);
1395  RandomSendInfo.StartTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1396  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_RANDOM_SEND = 1;
1397  }
1398 
1399  #if defined(ENABLE_ROUTING_UPDATE)
1400  if( RoutingUpdateCounter[sourceShortAddress.v[1]] == 0 )
1401  {
1402  #endif
1403  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveRoutingTable = 1;
1404  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveNeighborTable = 1;
1405 
1406  #if defined(ENABLE_ROUTING_UPDATE)
1407  }
1408  RoutingUpdateCounter[sourceShortAddress.v[1]] = ROUTING_UPDATE_EXPIRATION;
1409  #endif
1410  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1411  }
1412  }
1413  break;
1414 
1415 
1416 
1417  #endif
1418 
1419  case OPEN_SOCKET_RESPONSE:
1420  {
1421  BYTE j;
1422 
1423  //save the long address of the device
1424  for(j=0;j<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;j++)
1425  {
1426  tempLongAddress[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[j+MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2];
1427  }
1428 
1429  //create a new status for the device
1430  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x8D;
1431  //check the RxOnWhenIdle bit
1432  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2+MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH] & 0x80)
1433  {
1434  tempNodeStatus.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 0;
1435  }
1436 
1437  //copy the short address
1438  tempShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2];
1439  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3];
1440 
1441  //use my PANID since this version of MiWi PRO only supports single PANIDs
1442  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1443 
1444  //see if this node already exists in my table
1445  openSocketInfo.socketHandle = SearchForShortAddress();
1446 
1447  if(openSocketInfo.socketHandle != 0xFF)
1448  {
1449  //if it does then get the status of the node already in the table
1450  tempNodeStatus.Val = ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle].status.Val;
1451  tempNodeStatus.bits.longAddressValid = 1;
1452  tempNodeStatus.bits.shortAddressValid = 1;
1453  }
1454  else
1455  {
1456  //Family, RxOnWHenIdle, Neighbor/Network, P2P, ShortVal, LongVal, Direct, Valid
1457  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x8D;
1458  if(tempShortAddress.v[0] & 0x80)
1459  {
1460  tempNodeStatus.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 0;
1461  }
1462  }
1463  //update the network information
1464  openSocketInfo.socketHandle = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
1465  if( openSocketInfo.socketHandle < 0xFF )
1466  {
1467  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1468  for(j = 0; j < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; j++)
1469  {
1470  ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle].PeerInfo[j] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH+4+MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+j];
1471  }
1472  #endif
1473  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
1474  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle]), openSocketInfo.socketHandle);
1475  #endif
1476  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 1;
1477  }
1478  else
1479  {
1480  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 0;
1481  }
1482 
1483  //clear out out request
1484  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 0;
1485 
1486  }
1487  break;
1488 
1489 
1490  #if defined(ENABLE_FREQUENCY_AGILITY)
1491 
1492  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
1493 
1494  case FA_COORDINATOR_REQUEST:
1495  {
1496  DWORD_VAL ChannelMap;
1497 
1498  ChannelMap.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2];
1499  ChannelMap.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3];
1500  ChannelMap.v[2] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+4];
1501  ChannelMap.v[3] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+5];
1502  MiApp_InitChannelHopping(ChannelMap.Val);
1503  }
1504  break;
1505 
1506 
1507  case FA_ENERGY_SCAN_REQUEST:
1508  {
1509  FrequencyAgilityInfo.ChannelMap.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2];
1510  FrequencyAgilityInfo.ChannelMap.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3];
1511  FrequencyAgilityInfo.ChannelMap.v[2] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+4];
1512  FrequencyAgilityInfo.ChannelMap.v[3] = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+5];
1513  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.Val = 0;
1514  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.EnergyScan = 1;
1515  FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1516  }
1517  break;
1518 
1519 
1520  case FA_SUGGEST_CHANNEL:
1521  {
1522  if( FA_MAX_NOISE_THRESHOLD < EnergyScanResults[MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2]] )
1523  {
1524  MiApp_FlushTx();
1525  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE);
1526  MiApp_WriteData(FA_DISPUTE_CHANNEL);
1527  MiApp_WriteData(MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2]);
1528  tempShortAddress.Val = 0;
1529  MiApp_UnicastAddress(tempShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
1530  }
1531  }
1532  break;
1533 
1534 
1535  case FA_DISPUTE_CHANNEL:
1536  {
1537  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2] == FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.SuggestChannel )
1538  {
1539  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.DisputeChannel = 1;
1540  }
1541  }
1542  break;
1543 
1544  case RESYNCHRONIZATION_REQUEST:
1545  {
1546  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2] != currentChannel )
1547  {
1548  break;
1549  }
1550  MAC_FlushTx();
1551  TxBuffer[0] = defaultHops;
1552  TxBuffer[1] = 0x02;
1553  TxBuffer[2] = myPANID.v[0];
1554  TxBuffer[3] = myPANID.v[1];
1555  TxBuffer[4] = MACRxPacket.Payload[8];
1556  TxBuffer[5] = MACRxPacket.Payload[9];
1557  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0];
1558  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1];
1559  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0];
1560  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1];
1561  TxBuffer[10] = MiWiPROSeqNum++;
1562  TxBuffer[11] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE;
1563  TxBuffer[12] = RESYNCHRONIZATION_RESPONSE;
1564 
1565  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
1566  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
1567  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1568  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
1569  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
1570  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1571  MTP.DestAddress = &(MACRxPacket.Payload[8]);
1572  #else
1573  tempShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[8];
1574  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[9];
1575  i = SearchForShortAddress();
1576  if( i == 0xFF )
1577  {
1578  break;
1579  }
1580  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
1581  #endif
1582 
1583  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, 13);
1584  }
1585  break;
1586  #endif
1587 
1588  case CHANNEL_HOPPING_REQUEST:
1589  {
1590  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+2] == currentChannel )
1591  {
1592  FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1593  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.ChangeChannel = 1;
1594  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.SuggestChannel = MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN+3];
1595  }
1596  }
1597  break;
1598 
1599  case RESYNCHRONIZATION_RESPONSE:
1600  {
1601  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Resynning = 0;
1602  }
1603  break;
1604 
1605 
1606  #endif
1607 
1608  default:
1609  //unknown stack request. don't do anything
1610  //just let this packet die
1611  break;
1612  }
1613  }
1614  else
1615  {
1616  // in case receive acknowledgement
1617  if( (AcknowledgementSeq == MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-1]) &&
1618  (sourceShortAddress.Val == AcknowledgementAddr.Val) )
1619  {
1620  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
1621  }
1622  if( sourceShortAddress.v[0] > 0x80 )
1623  {
1624  MiApp_CB_RFDAcknowledgement(sourceShortAddress.Val, MACRxPacket.Payload[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN-1]);
1625  }
1626  break;
1627  }
1628  }
1629  else
1630  {
1631  //This data is for the user, pass it up to them
1632  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
1633  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.DataRequesting = 0;
1634  #endif
1635  rxMessage.PayloadSize = MACRxPacket.PayloadLen - 11;
1636  rxMessage.Payload = &MACRxPacket.Payload[11];
1637  rxMessage.SourcePANID.Val = sourcePANID.Val;
1638  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[8] == 0xFF && MACRxPacket.Payload[9] == 0xFF )
1639  {
1640  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1641  rxMessage.flags.bits.altSrcAddr = MACRxPacket.altSourceAddress;
1642  rxMessage.SourceAddress = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress;
1643  #else
1644  if( MACRxPacket.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt )
1645  {
1646  rxMessage.SourceAddress = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress;
1647  }
1648  else
1649  {
1650  rxMessage.flags.bits.altSrcAddr = 1;
1651  rxMessage.SourceAddress = &(MACRxPacket.Payload[8]);
1652  }
1653  #endif
1654  }
1655  else
1656  {
1657  rxMessage.flags.bits.altSrcAddr = 1;
1658  rxMessage.SourceAddress = &(MACRxPacket.Payload[8]);
1659  }
1660  rxMessage.flags.bits.srcPrsnt = 1;
1661 
1662  if( rxMessage.PayloadSize > 0 )
1663  {
1664  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.RxHasUserData = 1;
1665  }
1666 
1667  }
1668  }
1669  else
1670  {
1671  //if this packet wasn't for me
1672  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
1673  //then if I am a coordinator pass it along to the
1674  //next hop, decrementing the number of hops available
1675  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[0] > 0 )
1676  {
1677  MACRxPacket.Payload[0]--; //decrement the hops counter
1678  MAC_FlushTx();
1679  for(i = 0; i < MACRxPacket.PayloadLen; i++)
1680  {
1681  MiApp_WriteData(MACRxPacket.Payload[i]);
1682  }
1683 
1684  if( (destShortAddress.v[1] == myShortAddress.v[1]) &&
1685  (TxBuffer[11] == MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE) &&
1686  (TxBuffer[12] == ACK_REPORT_TYPE) )
1687  {
1688  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
1689  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
1690 
1691  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1692  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
1693  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
1694  MTP.DestAddress = destShortAddress.v;
1695  MTP.DestPANID.Val = destPANID.Val;
1696  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
1697  #else
1698  tempShortAddress.Val = destShortAddress.Val;
1699  if( (i = SearchForShortAddress()) != 0xFF )
1700  {
1701  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
1702  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
1703  }
1704  #endif
1705  }
1706  else
1707  {
1708  RouteMessage(destPANID, destShortAddress, MACRxPacket.flags.bits.secEn);
1709  }
1710  }
1711  #endif
1712  }
1713 
1714  }
1715  break;
1716 
1717  //if it is a beacon packet
1718  case PACKET_TYPE_BEACON:
1719  {
1720  BYTE rxIndex;
1721 
1722  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1723  rxIndex = 0;
1724  #else
1725  rxIndex = 4;
1726  #endif
1727 
1728 
1729  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[rxIndex+4] != MIWI_PRO_PROTOCOL_ID)
1730  {
1731  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_END_DEVICE)
1732  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[rxIndex+4] != MIWI_PROTOCOL_ID)
1733  #endif
1734  {
1735  break;
1736  }
1737  }
1738 
1739  //if we are looking for a network
1740  if(MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.searchingForNetwork)
1741  {
1742  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1743  tempPANID.Val = MACRxPacket.SourcePANID.Val;
1744  tempShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[0];
1745  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1];
1746  #else
1747  tempPANID.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[0];
1748  tempPANID.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[1];
1749  tempShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[2];
1750  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[3];
1751  #endif
1752 
1753  //ignore all beacon networks
1754  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[rxIndex] == 0xFF)
1755  {
1756  MIWI_PRO_CAPACITY_INFO CapacityByte;
1757  CapacityByte.Val = MACRxPacket.Payload[rxIndex+1];
1758  if( (ActiveScanResultIndex < ACTIVE_SCAN_RESULT_SIZE) && (CapacityByte.bits.ConnMode <= ENABLE_PREV_CONN) )
1759  {
1760 
1761  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Channel = currentChannel;
1762  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].RSSIValue = rxMessage.PacketRSSI;
1763  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].LQIValue = rxMessage.PacketLQI;
1764  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].PANID.Val = tempPANID.Val;
1765 
1766  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Capability.Val = 0;
1767  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Capability.bits.Direct = 1;
1768  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Capability.bits.Role = CapacityByte.bits.Role;
1769  if( CapacityByte.bits.Security )
1770  {
1771  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Capability.bits.SecurityEn = 1;
1772  }
1773  if( CapacityByte.bits.ConnMode <= ENABLE_PREV_CONN )
1774  {
1775  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Capability.bits.AllowJoin = 1;
1776  }
1777 
1778  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
1779  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Capability.bits.altSrcAddr = 1;
1780  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Address[0] = rxMessage.SourceAddress[0];
1781  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Address[1] = rxMessage.SourceAddress[1];
1782  #else
1783  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
1784  {
1785  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].Address[i] = rxMessage.SourceAddress[i];
1786  }
1787  #endif
1788  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1789  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
1790  {
1791  ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanResultIndex].PeerInfo[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[rxIndex+6+i];
1792  }
1793  #endif
1794  ActiveScanResultIndex++;
1795  }
1796  }
1797  }
1798  }
1799  break;
1800 
1801 
1802  //if it is a command packet
1803  case PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND:
1804 HANDLE_COMMAND_PACKET:
1805  //figure out which command packet it is
1806  switch(MACRxPacket.Payload[0])
1807  {
1808  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
1809  case MAC_COMMAND_ASSOCIATION_REQUEST:
1810  {
1811  BYTE handle;
1812  BYTE associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_SUCCESSFUL;
1813  BYTE entry;
1814 
1815  if( ConnMode > ENABLE_PREV_CONN )
1816  {
1817  break;
1818  }
1819 
1820  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork == 0 )
1821  {
1822  break;
1823  }
1824 
1825  //get the long address of the device
1826  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
1827  {
1828  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[i];
1829  }
1830 
1831  handle = SearchForLongAddress();
1832  if( handle != 0xFF && ConnectionTable[handle].status.bits.isFamily && handle != myParent &&
1833  ConnectionTable[handle].status.bits.shortAddressValid )
1834  {
1835  tempShortAddress.Val = ConnectionTable[handle].AltAddress.Val;
1836  if( ConnMode > ENABLE_PREV_CONN )
1837  {
1838  break;
1839  }
1840  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1841  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
1842  {
1843  ConnectionTable[handle].PeerInfo[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[2+i];
1844  }
1845  #endif
1846  goto START_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
1847  }
1848 
1849 
1850  if( ConnMode > ENABLE_ALL_CONN )
1851  {
1852  break;
1853  }
1854  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0xA7;
1855  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1856 
1857  //add this node to the network table
1858  handle = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
1859  if( handle == 0xFF )
1860  {
1861  associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_PAN_FULL;
1862  tempShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFE;
1863  goto START_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
1864  }
1865 
1866  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1867  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
1868  {
1869  ConnectionTable[handle].PeerInfo[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[2+i];
1870  }
1871  #endif
1872 
1873 
1874  //if entry was successful then assign the device a short address
1875  if( MACRxPacket.Payload[1] & 0x40 )
1876  {
1877  // if this device is a potential coordinator
1878  if( role != ROLE_PAN_COORDINATOR )
1879  {
1880  MiApp_FlushTx();
1881  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE); //Report Type
1882  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_REPORT); //Report ID
1883  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_REPORT_STATUS_JOIN);
1884  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
1885  {
1886  MiApp_WriteData(tempLongAddress[i]);
1887  }
1888  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
1889  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
1890  {
1891  MiApp_WriteData(AdditionalNodeID[i]);
1892  }
1893  #endif
1894 
1895  tempShortAddress.Val = 0;
1896  MiApp_UnicastAddress(tempShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
1897  break;
1898  }
1899  else
1900  {
1901  BYTE j;
1902  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
1903 
1904  //search to see if there is a coordinator address available
1905  for(j=1;j<NUM_COORDINATOR;j++)
1906  {
1907  tempShortAddress.v[1] = j;
1908  entry = SearchForShortAddress();
1909 
1910  if(entry == 0xFF)
1911  {
1912  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0x00;
1913  tempShortAddress.v[1] = j;
1914  FamilyTree[j] = 0;
1915  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_FAMILY_TREE = FAMILY_TREE_BROADCAST;
1916  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
1917  backgroundTaskTick.Val -= (ONE_SECOND/2);
1918 
1919  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveFamilyTree = 1;
1920  break;
1921  }
1922  }
1923 
1924  if(j==NUM_COORDINATOR)
1925  {
1926  // no more coordinator available
1927  tempShortAddress.v[1] = 0;
1928  for(i = 1; i < 128; i++)
1929  {
1930  tempShortAddress.v[0] = i;
1931  if( SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF )
1932  {
1933  tempShortAddress.v[0] = i + 0x80;
1934  if( SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF )
1935  {
1936  tempShortAddress.v[0] = i;
1937  break;
1938  }
1939  }
1940  }
1941 
1942  if( i > 127 )
1943  {
1944  associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_PAN_FULL;
1945  tempShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFE;
1946  goto START_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
1947  }
1948  }
1949  }
1950 
1951  }
1952  else
1953  {
1954  tempShortAddress.v[1] = myShortAddress.v[1];
1955 
1956  for(i = 1; i < 128; i++)
1957  {
1958  tempShortAddress.v[0] = i;
1959  if( SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF )
1960  {
1961  tempShortAddress.v[0] = i + 0x80;
1962  if( SearchForShortAddress() == 0xFF )
1963  {
1964  tempShortAddress.v[0] = i;
1965  break;
1966  }
1967  }
1968  }
1969 
1970  if( i > 127 )
1971  {
1972  associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_PAN_FULL;
1973  tempShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFE;
1974  goto START_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
1975  }
1976  }
1977 
1978  //create a new status entry for the device
1979  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0xBF;
1980 
1981  //mark if the Rx is on when idle
1982  if((MACRxPacket.Payload[1] & 0x01) == 0)
1983  {
1984  tempNodeStatus.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 0;
1985  tempShortAddress.v[0] |= 0x80;
1986  }
1987 
1988  if( MiApp_CB_AllowConnection(handle) == FALSE )
1989  {
1990  ConnectionTable[handle].status.Val = 0;
1991  associateStatus = ASSOCIATION_ACCESS_DENIED;
1992  }
1993 
1994  //update the information in the network table
1995  if( associateStatus == ASSOCIATION_SUCCESSFUL )
1996  {
1997  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
1998  handle = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
1999 
2000  if( handle < CONNECTION_SIZE )
2001  {
2002  ConnectionTable[handle].status.bits.FinishJoin = 1;
2003 
2004  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
2005  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
2006  {
2007  ConnectionTable[handle].PeerInfo[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[2+i];
2008  }
2009  #endif
2010 
2011  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2012  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[handle]), handle);
2013  #endif
2014  }
2015  }
2016 
2017 
2018 START_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE:
2019  //send back the asociation response
2020  TxBuffer[0] = MAC_COMMAND_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE;
2021  TxBuffer[1] = tempShortAddress.v[0];
2022  TxBuffer[2] = tempShortAddress.v[1];
2023  TxBuffer[3] = associateStatus;
2024  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
2025  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
2026  {
2027  TxBuffer[4+i] = AdditionalNodeID[i];
2028  }
2029  #endif
2030  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
2031  TxData = 4+ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE;
2032  #else
2033  TxBuffer[4+ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE] = myShortAddress.v[1];
2034  TxData = 5 + ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE;
2035  #endif
2036 
2037  #if defined(ENABLE_SECURITY)
2038  IncomingFrameCounter[handle].Val = 0;
2039  #endif
2040 
2041  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
2042  SendMACPacket(myPANID.v, ConnectionTable[handle].Address, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND, 0);
2043  #else
2044  SendMACPacket(ConnectionTable[handle].Address, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND);
2045  #endif
2046  }
2047  break;
2048  #endif
2049 
2050  case MAC_COMMAND_ASSOCIATION_RESPONSE:
2051  {
2052  if(MACRxPacket.Payload[3] == ASSOCIATION_SUCCESSFUL)
2053  {
2054  //The join was successful
2055  //assign myself the correct short address
2056  myShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.Payload[1];
2057  myShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[2];
2058 
2059  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
2060  if(myShortAddress.v[0] == 0x00)
2061  {
2062  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"I am a coordinator\r\n");
2063  role = ROLE_COORDINATOR;
2064  MiWiPROCapacityInfo.bits.Role = role;
2065  }
2066  else
2067  {
2068  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"I am an end device\r\n");
2069  role = ROLE_FFD_END_DEVICE;
2070  MiWiPROCapacityInfo.bits.Role = role;
2071  }
2072  nvmPutRole(&role);
2073  #endif
2074 
2075  //set the short address of the device
2076  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
2077 
2078  //mark as having joined a network
2079  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 1;
2080 
2081  //record the parents information
2082  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0xBF;
2083  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
2084  {
2085  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[i];
2086  }
2087 
2088 
2089  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
2090  tempShortAddress.Val = ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.Val;
2091  #else
2092  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
2093  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.Payload[4+ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE];
2094  #endif
2095  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
2096 
2097  //and add the parents information to the network table
2098  myParent = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
2099  #if defined(ENABLE_SECURITY)
2100  IncomingFrameCounter[myParent].Val = 0;
2101  #endif
2102 
2103  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
2104  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
2105  {
2106  ConnectionTable[myParent].PeerInfo[i] = MACRxPacket.Payload[4+i];
2107  }
2108  #endif
2109 
2110  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
2111  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_ROUTING_TABLE = ROUTING_TABLE_BROADCAST;
2112  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
2113  #endif
2114 
2115  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2116  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);
2117  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
2118  nvmPutMyParent(&myParent);
2119  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[myParent]), myParent);
2120  #endif
2121 
2122  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char *)"\r\nJoin the network successfully\r\n");
2123  }
2124  else
2125  {
2126  //Access denied, remove this as my parent
2127  myParent = 0xFF;
2128  myPANID.Val = 0xFFFF;
2129  tempShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFF;
2130  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(tempShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
2131  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2132  nvmPutMyParent(&myParent);
2133  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);
2134  #endif
2135  }
2136  }
2137  break;
2138 
2139  #if !defined(TARGET_SMALL)
2140  case MAC_COMMAND_DISASSOCIATION_NOTIFICATION:
2141  {
2142  BYTE cIndex;
2143 
2144  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork == 0 )
2145  {
2146  break;
2147  }
2148 
2149  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
2150  if( MACRxPacket.altSourceAddress )
2151  {
2152  tempShortAddress.v[0] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[0];
2153  tempShortAddress.v[1] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[1];
2154

2156  {
2157  break;
2158  }
2159  }
2160  else
2161  #endif
2162  {
2163  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
2164  {
2165  tempLongAddress[i] = MACRxPacket.SourceAddress[i];
2166  }

2168  {
2169  break;
2170  }
2171  }
2172 
2173  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
2174  if( ConnectionTable[cIndex].status.bits.isFamily )
2175  {

2177  {
2178  if( ConnectionTable[cIndex].AltAddress.v[0] == 0 )
2179  {

2181  {

2183  for(i = (NUM_COORDINATOR-1); i > 0; i--)
2184  {
2185  BYTE index;
2186  BYTE loopCheck;
2187 
2188  index = i;
2189  loopCheck = 0;

2191  {
2192  if( FamilyTree[index] == 0xFF )
2193  {
2194  break;
2195  }
2196

2198  {
2199  BYTE entry2;
2200 
2201  FamilyTree[i] = 0xFF;
2202  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;

2207  }
2208  break;
2209  }
2210 
2211  index = FamilyTree[index];
2212  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
2213  {
2214  break;
2215  }
2216  }
2217  }
2218  FamilyTree[ConnectionTable[cIndex].AltAddress.v[1]] = 0xFF;
2219  ConnectionTable[cIndex].status.Val = 0;
2220  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2221  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[cIndex]), cIndex);
2222  #endif
2223 
2224  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_FAMILY_TREE = FAMILY_TREE_BROADCAST;
2225  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
2226  backgroundTaskTick.Val -= (ONE_SECOND/2);
2227  }
2228  else
2229  {
2230  MiApp_FlushTx();
2231  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE); //Report Type
2232  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_REPORT); //Report ID
2233  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_REPORT_STATUS_LEAVE);
2234  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
2235  {
2236  MiApp_WriteData(ConnectionTable[cIndex].Address[i]);
2237  }
2238 
2239  tempShortAddress.Val = 0;
2240  MiApp_UnicastAddress(tempShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
2241  }
2242  }
2243  ConnectionTable[cIndex].status.Val = 0;
2244  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2245  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[cIndex]), cIndex);
2246  #endif
2247  }
2248  else // it is from my parent
2249  {
2250  // notify my children
2251  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
2252  {
2253  if( ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid &&
2254  ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isFamily && (i != myParent ))
2255  {
2256  MAC_FlushTx();
2257  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_DISASSOCIATION_NOTIFICATION);
2258  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
2259  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
2260  MTP.flags.bits.packetType = PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND;
2261  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
2262  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
2263  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
2264  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
2265  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].AltAddress.v;
2266  #else

2268  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
2269  #endif
2270  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
2271  DelayMs(100);
2272  }
2273  ConnectionTable[i].status.Val = 0;
2274  }
2275  MiApp_FlushTx();
2276  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE); //Report Type
2277  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_REPORT); //Report ID
2278  MiApp_WriteData(COORDINATOR_REPORT_STATUS_LEAVE);
2279  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
2280  {
2281  MiApp_WriteData(ConnectionTable[cIndex].Address[i]);
2282  }
2283 
2284  tempShortAddress.Val = 0;
2285  MiApp_UnicastAddress(tempShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
2286 
2287  myParent = 0xFF;
2288  myShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFF;
2289  myPANID.Val = 0xFFFF;
2290  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
2291  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 0;
2292  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR; i++)
2293  {
2294  FamilyTree[i] = 0xFF;
2295  for(cIndex = 0; cIndex < NUM_COORDINATOR/8; cIndex++)
2296  {
2297  NeighborRoutingTable[i][cIndex] = 0;
2298  }
2299  }
2300  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR/8; i++)
2301  {
2302  RoutingTable[i] = 0;
2303  }
2304  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2305  nvmPutMyParent(&myParent);
2306  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
2307  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);

2309  nvmPutRoutingTable(RoutingTable);

2311  nvmPutConnectionTable(ConnectionTable);
2312  #endif
2313  }
2314  }
2315  #else
2316  if( ConnectionTable[cIndex].status.bits.isFamily ) // it is from my parent
2317  {
2318  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
2319  {
2320  ConnectionTable[i].status.Val = 0;
2321  }
2322  myParent = 0xFF;
2323  myShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFF;
2324  myPANID.Val = 0xFFFF;
2325  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
2326  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 0;
2327  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
2328  nvmPutMyParent(&myParent);
2329  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
2330  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);

2332  #endif
2333  }
2334  #endif
2335 
2336  }

2338  #endif

2341 
2342  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR) && defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)

2772  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
2773  BYTE FindDepth(BYTE nodeMSB)
2774  {
2775  BYTE depth;
2776  BYTE target;
2777  BYTE loopCheck;
2778 
2779  if( nodeMSB == 0 )
2780  {
2781  return 0;
2782  }
2783  if( FamilyTree[nodeMSB] >= NUM_COORDINATOR )
2784  {
2785  return 0;
2786  }
2787 
2788  depth = 1;
2789  target = nodeMSB;
2790  loopCheck = 0;
2791  while( FamilyTree[target] )
2792  {
2793  target = FamilyTree[target];
2794  depth++;
2795  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
2796  {
2797  break;
2798  }
2799  }
2800  return depth;
2801  }
2802 
2803  #define DEST_NULL 0
2804  #define DEST_PARENT 1
2805  #define DEST_CHILD 2
2806  #define DEST_PEER 3
2807 
2808  BYTE FindRoutingPath(BYTE destMSB)
2809  {
2810  BYTE i;
2811  BYTE j;
2812  BYTE target;
2813  BYTE treeSteps;
2814  BYTE loopCheck;
2815  BYTE destRole = DEST_NULL;
2816 
2817  // house keeping check
2818  if( (destMSB > NUM_COORDINATOR) || (FamilyTree[0] == 0 && FamilyTree[destMSB] > NUM_COORDINATOR) )
2819  {
2820  return 0xFF;
2821  }
2822 
2823  // first check if I know this guy directly
2824  if( RoutingTable[destMSB/8] & (0x01 << (destMSB % 8)) )
2825  {
2826  // yes, I know this guy directly
2827  return destMSB;
2828  }
2829 
2830  // second, check if my neighbor know this guy
2831  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR; i++)
2832  {
2833  if( NeighborRoutingTable[i][destMSB/8] & (0x01 << (destMSB % 8)) )
2834  {
2835  return i;
2836  }
2837  }
2838 
2839  // check the maximum steps I need to rout insted of tree routing
2840  target = destMSB;
2841  loopCheck = 0;
2842  while(target)
2843  {
2844  if( FamilyTree[target] == myShortAddress.v[1] )
2845  {
2846  destRole = DEST_CHILD;
2847  treeSteps = FindDepth(destMSB) - FindDepth(myShortAddress.v[1]);
2848  break;
2849  }
2850  target = FamilyTree[target];
2851  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
2852  {
2853  break;
2854  }
2855  }
2856 
2857  if ( destRole == DEST_NULL )
2858  {
2859  target = myShortAddress.v[1];
2860  loopCheck = 0;
2861  while(target)
2862  {
2863  if( FamilyTree[target] == destMSB )
2864  {
2865  destRole = DEST_PARENT;
2866  treeSteps = FindDepth(myShortAddress.v[1]) - FindDepth(destMSB);
2867  break;
2868  }
2869  target = FamilyTree[target];
2870  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
2871  {
2872  break;
2873  }
2874  }
2875  }
2876 
2877  if( destRole == DEST_NULL )
2878  {
2879  destRole = DEST_PEER;
2880  treeSteps = FindDepth(destMSB);
2881  }
2882 
2883  for(i = 1; i < treeSteps; i++)
2884  {
2885  BYTE k;
2886 
2887  // check if I know this guy along with the parent path
2888  target = destMSB;
2889  for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
2890  {
2891  target = FamilyTree[target];
2892  }
2893  if( RoutingTable[target/8] & (0x01 << (target % 8)) )
2894  {
2895  return target;
2896  }
2897 
2898  // check if I know this guy along with the child path
2899  for(k = 0; k < NUM_COORDINATOR; k++)
2900  {
2901  if( FamilyTree[k] < NUM_COORDINATOR )
2902  {
2903  target = k;
2904  for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
2905  {
2906  target = FamilyTree[target];
2907  }
2908  if( (target == destMSB) && (RoutingTable[k/8] & (0x01 << (k%8))) )
2909  {
2910  return k;
2911  }
2912  }
2913  }
2914 
2915  // check if my neighbor know this guy along the parent path
2916  target = destMSB;
2917  for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
2918  {
2919  target = FamilyTree[target];
2920  }
2921  for(k = 0; k < NUM_COORDINATOR; k++)
2922  {
2923  if( NeighborRoutingTable[k][target/8] & (0x01 << (target%8)) )
2924  {
2925  return k;
2926  }
2927  }
2928 
2929  // check if my neighbor know this guy along the child path
2930  for(k = 0; k < NUM_COORDINATOR; k++)
2931  {
2932  if( FamilyTree[k] < NUM_COORDINATOR )
2933  {
2934  target = k;
2935  for(j = 0; j < i; j++)
2936  {
2937  target = FamilyTree[target];
2938  }
2939  if( target == destMSB )
2940  {
2941  for(j = 0; j < NUM_COORDINATOR; j++)
2942  {
2943  if( NeighborRoutingTable[j][k/8] & (0x01 << (k%8)) )
2944  {
2945  return j;
2946  }
2947  }
2948  }
2949  }
2950  }
2951 
2952  }
2953 
2954  // I have looked forward for three steps, now I need to go tree routing
2955  // check if the destination is my child
2956  if( destRole == DEST_CHILD )
2957  {
2958  i = destMSB;
2959  loopCheck = 0;
2960  while( (FamilyTree[i] != myShortAddress.v[1]) ||
2961  (RoutingTable[i/8] & (0x01 << (i % 8))) )
2962  {
2963  i = FamilyTree[i];
2964  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
2965  {
2966  break;
2967  }
2968  }
2969  return i;
2970  }
2971  else
2972  {
2973  i = FamilyTree[myShortAddress.v[1]];
2974  target = i;
2975  loopCheck = 0;
2976  while( (FamilyTree[i] != i) && (i != destMSB) )
2977  {
2978  if( RoutingTable[i/8] & (0x01 << (i%8)) )
2979  {
2980  target = i;
2981  }
2982  i = FamilyTree[i];
2983  if( loopCheck++ > NUM_COORDINATOR )
2984  {
2985  break;
2986  }
2987  }
2988  return target;
2989  }
2990  return 0xFF;
2991  }

2994  /*********************************************************************
2995  * Function: BOOL RouteMessage(WORD_VAL PANID,
2996  * WORD_VAL ShortAddress, BOOL SecEn)
2997  *
2998  * PreCondition: Coordinator has joined the network
2999  *
3000  * Input: PANID - PAN identifier of the destination
3001  * node
3002  * ShortAddress - Network short address of the
3003  * destination node
3004  * SecEn - Boolean to indicate if the message
3005  * payload needs to be secured
3006  *
3007  * Output: A boolean to indicate if routing successful
3008  *
3009  * Side Effects: None
3010  *
3011  * Overview: This function is the backbone of MiWi PRO routing
3012  * mechanism. MiWi PRO uses this function to route
3013  * the message across multiple hops to reach the
3014  * destination node.
3015  ********************************************************************/
3016  BOOL RouteMessage(WORD_VAL PANID, WORD_VAL ShortAddress, BOOL SecEn)
3017  {
3018  BYTE i;
3019  BYTE parentNode = ShortAddress.v[1];
3020 
3021  if( parentNode > 0x7F )
3022  {
3023  return FALSE;
3024  }
3025 
3026  if( FamilyTree[0] == 0 && FamilyTree[parentNode] > NUM_COORDINATOR )
3027  {
3028  // if the destination node has not join the network
3029  return FALSE;
3030  }
3031 
3032  for(i = 0; i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE; i++)
3033  {
3034  if( (PacketRecords[i].RxCounter > 0 ) &&
3035  (PacketRecords[i].AltSourceAddr.Val == ShortAddress.Val) &&
3036  (PacketRecords[i].MiWiPROSeq == TxBuffer[10])
3037  )
3038  {
3039  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_ROUTING_TABLE = ROUTING_TABLE_BROADCAST;
3040  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
3041  return FALSE;
3042  }
3043  }
3044 
3045  for(i = 0; i < PACKET_RECORD_SIZE; i++)
3046  {
3047  if( PacketRecords[i].RxCounter == 0 )
3048  {
3049  PacketRecords[i].RxCounter = INDIRECT_MESSAGE_TIMEOUT_CYCLE + 1;
3050  PacketRecords[i].MiWiPROSeq = TxBuffer[10];
3051  PacketRecords[i].AltSourceAddr.Val = ShortAddress.Val;
3052  PacketRecords[i].StartTick = MiWi_TickGet();
3053  break;
3054  }
3055  }
3056 
3057  // first check if it is one of my end device children
3058  if( parentNode == myShortAddress.v[1] )
3059  {
3060  // destination is my child
3061  if( ShortAddress.v[0] > 0x80 )
3062  {
3063  #if defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)
3064  // this is a sleeping device, need indirect message
3065  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3066  return SaveIndirectMessage(FALSE, PANID, ShortAddress.v, TRUE, SecEn);
3067  #else
3068  tempShortAddress.Val = ShortAddress.Val;
3069  if( (i = SearchForShortAddress()) == 0xFF )
3070  {
3071  return SaveIndirectMessage(FALSE, ShortAddress.v, TRUE, SecEn);
3072  }
3073 
3074  return SaveIndirectMessage(FALSE, ConnectionTable[i].Address, FALSE, SecEn);
3075  #endif
3076  #else
3077  return FALSE;
3078  #endif
3079  }
3080  else
3081  {
3082  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
3083  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
3084  MTP.flags.bits.secEn = SecEn;
3085 
3086  tempShortAddress.Val = ShortAddress.Val;
3087 
3088  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3089  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
3090  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
3091  MTP.DestAddress = tempShortAddress.v;
3092  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
3093  #else
3094  if( (i = SearchForShortAddress()) != 0xFF )
3095  {
3096  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
3097  }
3098  else
3099  {
3100  // the children's info is not in the connection table
3101  // should not happen
3102  return FALSE;
3103  }
3104  #endif
3105  return MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
3106  }
3107  }
3108 
3109  // now routing
3110  parentNode = FindRoutingPath(ShortAddress.v[1]);
3111  if( parentNode == 0xFF )
3112  {
3113  return FALSE;
3114  }
3115 
3116  if( RouterFailures[parentNode] >= MAX_ROUTING_FAILURE )
3117  {
3118  BYTE i;
3119 
3120  RouterFailures[parentNode] = 0;
3121  RoutingTable[parentNode/8] &= (0x01 << (parentNode % 8) ) ^ 0xFF;
3122  for(i = 0; i < NUM_COORDINATOR/8; i++)
3123  {
3124  NeighborRoutingTable[parentNode][i] = 0;
3125  }
3126  /*
3127  if (parentNode == myParent)
3128  {
3129  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 0;
3130  myParent = 0xFF;
3131  }
3132  */
3133  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
3134  nvmPutRoutingTable(RoutingTable);
3135  nvmPutNeighborRoutingTable(NeighborRoutingTable);
3136  #endif
3137 
3138  MiWiPROStatus.bits.COMM_ROUTING_TABLE = ROUTING_TABLE_BROADCAST;
3139  backgroundTaskTick = MiWi_TickGet();
3140  return FALSE;
3141  }
3142 
3143  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
3144  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
3145  MTP.flags.bits.secEn = SecEn;
3146 
3147  tempShortAddress.v[0] = 0;
3148  tempShortAddress.v[1] = parentNode;
3149 
3150  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3151  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
3152  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
3153  MTP.DestAddress = tempShortAddress.v;
3154  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
3155  #else
3156  if( (i = SearchForShortAddress()) != 0xFF )
3157  {
3158  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
3159  }
3160  else
3161  {
3162  // highly impossible for none 15.4, where the
3163  // access of Coordinators not through beacon
3164  RouterFailures[parentNode]++;
3165  return FALSE;
3166  }
3167  #endif
3168  if( MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData) == FALSE )
3169  {
3170  RouterFailures[parentNode]++;
3171  return FALSE;
3172  }
3173 
3174  RouterFailures[parentNode] = 0;
3175  return TRUE;
3176 
3177  }
3178  #endif
3179

3183  /*********************************************************************
3184  * Function: BOOL SendMACPacket(BYTE *PANID, BYTE *Address,
3185  * BYTE PacketType, BYTE ModeMask)
3186  *
3187  * PreCondition: Transceiver has been initialized properly
3188  *
3189  * Input: PANID - PAN identifier of the destination
3190  * node. (IEEE 802.15.4 only)
3191  * Address - Address of the destination node.
3192  * Always long address for non-IEEE
3193  * 802.15.4, can be short or long
3194  * address for IEEE 802.15.4.
3195  * PacketType - The packet type, passed to
3196  * transceiver driver directly
3197  * ModeMask - The source and destination address
3198  * mode (short or long) maks.
3199  * (IEEE 802.15.4 only)
3200  *
3201  * Output: A boolean to indicate if packet sent successfully
3202  *
3203  * Side Effects: None
3204  *
3205  * Overview: This function is a bridge from MiWi PRO layer to
3206  * transceiver MAC layer. It organizes the MiMAC
3207  * layer parameters and return the status of
3208  * MiMAC transmission status.
3209  ********************************************************************/
3210  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3211  BOOL SendMACPacket(BYTE *PANID, BYTE *Address, BYTE PacketType, BYTE ModeMask)
3212  #else
3213  BOOL SendMACPacket(BYTE *Address, BYTE PacketType)
3214  #endif
3215  {
3216  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
3217 
3218  MTP.flags.bits.packetType = PacketType;
3219  if( Address == NULL )
3220  {
3221  MTP.flags.bits.broadcast = 1;
3222  }
3223  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = (MTP.flags.bits.broadcast) ? 0:1;
3224  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
3225 
3226  MTP.DestAddress = Address;
3227 
3228  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3229  if( (ModeMask & MSK_ALT_DST_ADDR) > 0)
3230  {
3231  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
3232  }
3233  else
3234  {
3235  MTP.altDestAddr = FALSE;
3236  }
3237  if( (ModeMask & MSK_ALT_SRC_ADDR) > 0)
3238  {
3239  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
3240  }
3241  else
3242  {
3243  MTP.altSrcAddr = FALSE;
3244  }
3245  MTP.DestPANID.v[0] = PANID[0];
3246  MTP.DestPANID.v[1] = PANID[1];
3247  #endif
3248 
3249  return MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
3250  }

3528  /*********************************************************************

3531  * PreCondition: None
3532  *

3534  *

3536  * otherwise this function returns the index of the
3537  * first blank entry in the table
3538  *
3539  * Side Effects: None
3540  *
3541  * Overview: This function is used to determine the next available
3542  * slot in the network table. This function can be used
3543  * to manually create entries in the networkTable
3544  ********************************************************************/

3546  {

3552  {
3553  return i;
3554  }
3555  }
3556  return 0xFF;
3557  }
