3776  /*********************************************************************
3777  * Function: void DiscoverNodeByEUI(void)
3778  *
3779  * PreCondition: tempLongAddress[0-7] need to be set to the address
3780  * that needs to be discovered
3781  *
3782  * Input: None
3783  *
3784  * Output: None
3785  *
3786  * Side Effects: None
3787  *
3788  * Overview: This function constructs and sends out the from to
3789  * discover a device by their EUI address
3790  ********************************************************************/
3791 
3792  #if defined(SUPPORT_EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH)
3793  void DiscoverNodeByEUI(void)
3794  {
3795  BYTE i;
3796 
3797  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.EUISearching = 1;
3798  #ifndef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
3799  //if we a member of the network
3800  if(MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork == 1)
3801  {
3802  MAC_FlushTx();
3803 
3804  TxBuffer[TxData++] = defaultHops;
3805  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0x06; //Frame Control
3806  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest PANID LSB
3807  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest PANID MSB
3808  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest address LSB
3809  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest address MSB
3810  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
3811  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
3812  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
3813  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB
3814  TxBuffer[TxData++] = MiWiPROSeqNum++; //seq num
3815  TxBuffer[TxData++] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE; //Report Type
3816  TxBuffer[TxData++] = EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH_REQUEST; //Report ID
3817  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
3818  {
3819  TxBuffer[TxData++] = tempLongAddress[i]; //Data byte 0
3820  }
3821 
3822  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
3823  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
3824  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
3825 
3826  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3827  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v;
3828  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[myParent].PANID.Val;
3829  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
3830  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
3831  #else
3832  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].LongAddress;
3833  #endif
3834 
3835  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
3836  }
3837  #else
3838  //if I am a coordinator capable device
3839  if(MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork == 1)
3840  {
3841  MAC_FlushTx();
3842  TxBuffer[TxData++] = defaultHops;
3843  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0x06; //Frame Control
3844  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest PANID LSB
3845  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest PANID MSB
3846  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest address LSB
3847  TxBuffer[TxData++] = 0xFF; //dest address MSB
3848  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
3849  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
3850  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
3851  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB
3852  TxBuffer[TxData++] = MiWiPROSeqNum++; //seq num
3853  TxBuffer[TxData++] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE; //Report Type
3854  TxBuffer[TxData++] = EUI_ADDRESS_SEARCH_REQUEST; //Report ID
3855  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
3856  {
3857  TxBuffer[TxData++] = tempLongAddress[i]; //Data byte 0
3858  }
3859 
3860  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
3861  MTP.flags.bits.broadcast = 1;
3862 
3863  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
3864  MTP.DestAddress = NULL;
3865  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
3866  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
3867  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
3868  #else
3869  MTP.DestAddress = NULL;
3870  #endif
3871 
3872  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
3873 
3874  }
3875  #endif
3876  }
3877  #endif
3878 
3879  /*********************************************************************
3880  * Function: void OpenSocket(void)
3881  *
3882  * PreCondition: None
3883  *
3884  * Input: BYTE socketType - either CLUSTER_SOCKET for a cluster
3885  * socket or P2P_SOCKET for a P2P socket.
3886  *
3887  * Output: None
3888  *
3889  * Side Effects: This will send out a packet trying to create a socket
3890  *
3891  * Overview: This will send out a packet to the PAN coordinator
3892  * that is trying to link this device to another device.
3893  * the socket operation is complete when OpenSocketComplete()
3894  * returns TRUE. The status of the operation is retreived through
3895  * the OpenSocketSuccessful() function. If it returns TRUE
3896  * then OpenSocketHandle() returns the handle of the created
3897  * socket. This value is valid until openSocket() is called
3898  * again. If OpenSocketComplete() returns FALSE then the
3899  * scan in still in progress.
3900  ********************************************************************/
3901  void OpenSocket(void)
3902  {
3903  BYTE i;
3904 
3905  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 0;
3906 
3907  #ifdef NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR
3908 
3909  //If I am the PAN coordinator
3910  if(role == ROLE_PAN_COORDINATOR)
3911  {
3912  //if there isn't a request currently open
3913  if(openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen == 0)
3914  {
3915  //I am the PAN coordinator, there is no reason to send a request out
3916  openSocketInfo.socketStart = MiWi_TickGet();
3917  openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.Val = 0x0000;
3918  for(i=0;i<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;i++)
3919  {
3920  openSocketInfo.LongAddress1[i] = myLongAddress[i];
3921  }
3922  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 1;
3923  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 0;
3924  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
3925  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
3926  {
3927  openSocketInfo.AdditionalNodeID1[i] = AdditionalNodeID[i];
3928  }
3929  #endif
3930  }
3931  else
3932  {
3933  if(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.Val == 0x0000)
3934  {
3935  //I am the PAN coordinator and I don't want to talk to myself so lets forget we even tried
3936  return;
3937  }
3938 
3939  if(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.Val != myShortAddress.Val)
3940  {
3941  MiApp_FlushTx();
3942  TxBuffer[TxData++] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE; //Report Type
3943  TxBuffer[TxData++] = OPEN_SOCKET_RESPONSE; //Report ID
3944  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
3945  {
3946  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myLongAddress[i];
3947  }
3948  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[0];
3949  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myShortAddress.v[1];
3950  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
3951  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
3952  {
3953  TxBuffer[TxData++] = AdditionalNodeID[i];
3954  }
3955  #endif
3956 
3957  for(i=0;i<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;i++)
3958  {
3959  tempLongAddress[i] = openSocketInfo.LongAddress1[i];
3960  }
3961  tempShortAddress.Val = openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.Val;
3962 
3963  openSocketInfo.socketHandle = SearchForShortAddress();
3964 
3965  if(openSocketInfo.socketHandle != 0xFF)
3966  {
3967  tempNodeStatus.Val = ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle].status.Val;
3968  }
3969  else
3970  {
3971  //Family, RxOnWHenIdle, Neighbor/Network, P2P, ShortVal, LongVal, Direct, Valid
3972  //tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x2D;
3973  tempNodeStatus.Val = 0x8C;
3974  if((tempShortAddress.v[0] & 0x80) == 0)
3975  {
3976  tempNodeStatus.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 1;
3977  }
3978  }
3979  tempPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
3980 
3981  openSocketInfo.socketHandle = AddNodeToNetworkTable();
3982 
3983  if( openSocketInfo.socketHandle < 0xFF )
3984  {
3985  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
3986  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
3987  {
3988  ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle].PeerInfo[i] = openSocketInfo.AdditionalNodeID1[i];
3989  }
3990  #endif
3991  }
3992 
3993  //RouteMessage(myPANID,openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1,FALSE);
3994  MiApp_UnicastAddress(openSocketInfo.ShortAddress1.v, FALSE, FALSE);
3995  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 0;
3996  openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound = 1;
3997 
3998  if( openSocketInfo.socketHandle < 0xFF )
3999  {
4000  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
4001  nvmPutConnectionTableIndex(&(ConnectionTable[openSocketInfo.socketHandle]), openSocketInfo.socketHandle);
4002  #endif
4003  }
4004 
4005  }
4006  }
4007  return;
4008  }
4009  else
4010  {
4011  //take a record of when you started to send the socket request
4012  //and send it to the PAN coordinator
4013  openSocketInfo.socketStart = MiWi_TickGet();
4014  }
4015 
4016  #else
4017  openSocketInfo.socketStart = MiWi_TickGet();
4018  #endif
4019 
4020  tempShortAddress.Val = 0x0000;
4021 
4022  MiApp_FlushTx();
4023  TxBuffer[TxData++] = MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE; //Report Type
4024  TxBuffer[TxData++] = OPEN_SOCKET_REQUEST; //Report ID
4025  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
4026  {
4027  TxBuffer[TxData++] = myLongAddress[i];
4028  }
4029  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
4030  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
4031  {
4032  TxBuffer[TxData++] = AdditionalNodeID[i];
4033  }
4034  #endif
4035 
4036  MiApp_UnicastAddress(tempShortAddress.v, FALSE, FALSE);
4037 
4038  openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen = 1;
4039 
4040 
4041  }

4043  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR) && defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)
4044  /*********************************************************************
4045  * BOOL IndirectPacket(BOOL Broadcast,
4046  * WORD_VAL DestinationPANID,
4047  * BYTE *DestinationAddress,
4048  * BOOL isCommand,
4049  * BOOL SecurityEnabled)
4050  *
4051  * Overview: This function store the indirect message for node
4052  * that turns off radio when idle
4053  *
4054  * PreCondition: None
4055  *
4056  * Input: Broadcast - Boolean to indicate if the indirect
4057  * message a broadcast message
4058  * DestinationPANID - The PAN Identifier of the
4059  * destination node
4060  * DestinationAddress - The pointer to the destination
4061  * long address
4062  * isCommand - The boolean to indicate if the packet
4063  * is command
4064  * SecurityEnabled - The boolean to indicate if the
4065  * packet needs encryption
4066  *
4067  * Output: boolean to indicate if operation successful
4068  *
4069  * Side Effects: An indirect message stored and waiting to deliever
4070  * to sleeping device. An indirect message timer
4071  * has started to expire the indirect message in case
4072  * RFD does not acquire data in predefined interval
4073  *
4074  ********************************************************************/
4075  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4076  BOOL SaveIndirectMessage(INPUT BOOL Broadcast,
4077  INPUT WORD_VAL DestinationPANID,
4078  INPUT BYTE *DestinationAddress,
4079  INPUT BOOL isAltAddress,
4080  INPUT BOOL SecurityEnabled)
4081  #else
4082  BOOL SaveIndirectMessage(INPUT BOOL Broadcast,
4083  INPUT BYTE *DestinationAddress,
4084  INPUT BOOL isAltAddress,
4085  INPUT BOOL SecurityEnabled)
4086  #endif
4087  {
4088  BYTE i;
4089  BYTE j;
4090 
4091  for(i = 0; i < INDIRECT_MESSAGE_SIZE; i++)
4092  {
4093  if( indirectMessages[i].flags.bits.isValid == 0)
4094  {
4095  indirectMessages[i].flags.Val = 0;
4096  indirectMessages[i].flags.bits.isBroadcast = Broadcast;
4097  indirectMessages[i].flags.bits.isSecured = SecurityEnabled;
4098  indirectMessages[i].flags.bits.isValid = 1;
4099  indirectMessages[i].flags.bits.isAltAddr = isAltAddress;
4100  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4101  if( isAltAddress == FALSE )
4102  {
4103  if( Broadcast == FALSE )
4104  {
4105  for(j = 0; j < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; j++)
4106  {
4107  indirectMessages[i].DestAddress[j] = DestinationAddress[j];
4108  }
4109  }
4110  }
4111  else
4112  {
4113  if( Broadcast == FALSE )
4114  {
4115  indirectMessages[i].DestAddress[0] = DestinationAddress[0];
4116  indirectMessages[i].DestAddress[1] = DestinationAddress[1];
4117  }
4118  }
4119  indirectMessages[i].DestPANID.Val = DestinationPANID.Val;
4120  #else
4121  if( Broadcast == FALSE )
4122  {
4123  if( isAltAddress )
4124  {
4125  indirectMessages[i].DestAddress[0] = DestinationAddress[0];
4126  indirectMessages[i].DestAddress[1] = DestinationAddress[1];
4127  }
4128  else
4129  {
4130  for(j = 0; j < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; j++)
4131  {
4132  indirectMessages[i].DestAddress[j] = DestinationAddress[j];
4133  }
4134  }
4135  }
4136  #endif
4137 
4138  #if defined(ENABLE_SECURITY) && defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER) && !defined(TARGET_SMALL)
4139  if( SecurityEnabled )
4140  {
4141  if( isAltAddress )
4142  {
4143  tempShortAddress.v[0] = DestinationAddress[0];
4144  tempShortAddress.v[1] = DestinationAddress[1];
4145  j = SearchForShortAddress();
4146  }
4147  else
4148  {
4149  for(j = 0; j < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; j++)
4150  {
4151  tempLongAddress[j] = DestinationAddress[j];
4152  }
4153  j = SearchForLongAddress();
4154  }
4155  }
4156  #endif
4157  indirectMessages[i].PayLoadSize = TxData;
4158  for(j = 0; j < TxData; j++)
4159  {
4160  indirectMessages[i].PayLoad[j] = TxBuffer[j];
4161  }
4162  indirectMessages[i].TickStart = MiWi_TickGet();
4163  return TRUE;
4164  }
4165  }
4166 
4167  return FALSE;
4168  }
4169  #endif

4173  /*********************************************************************
4174  * Function: BYTE SearchForShortAddress(void)
4175  *
4176  * PreCondition: tempShortAddress and tempPANID are set to the device
4177  * that you are looking for
4178  *
4179  * Input: BYTE entryType - this is set to NEIGHBOR if you
4180  * want to find a Node on the network. This value
4181  * is set to NETWORK if you are looking for a specific network
4182  * and not a node on the current operating network
4183  *
4184  * Output: BYTE - the index of the network table entry of the
4185  * requested device. 0xFF indicates that the requested
4186  * device doesn't exist in the network table
4187  *
4188  * Side Effects: None
4189  *
4190  * Overview: This function looks up the index of a node or network
4191  * in the network table by short address.
4192  ********************************************************************/
4193  BYTE SearchForShortAddress(void)
4194  {
4195  BYTE i;
4196 
4197  for(i=0;i<CONNECTION_SIZE;i++)
4198  {
4199  if(ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid && ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.shortAddressValid)
4200  {
4201  if(ConnectionTable[i].AltAddress.Val == tempShortAddress.Val)
4202  {
4203  return i;
4204  }
4205  }
4206  }
4207  return 0xFF;
4208  }

4211  /*********************************************************************
4212  * Function: void SendBeacon(void)
4213  *
4214  * PreCondition: Coordinator has joined the network
4215  *
4216  * Input: None
4217  *
4218  * Output: None
4219  *
4220  * Side Effects: None
4221  *
4222  * Overview: This function sends a beacon frame.
4223  ********************************************************************/
4224  void SendBeacon(void)
4225  {
4226  BYTE i;
4227 
4228  MAC_FlushTx();
4229  #if !defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4230  MiApp_WriteData(myPANID.v[0]);
4231  MiApp_WriteData(myPANID.v[1]);
4232  MiApp_WriteData(myShortAddress.v[0]);
4233  MiApp_WriteData(myShortAddress.v[1]);
4234  #endif
4235  MiApp_WriteData(0xFF); //superframe specification (BO = 0xF, SO = 0xF)
4236  MiApp_WriteData(MiWiPROCapacityInfo.Val);
4237  MiApp_WriteData(0x00); // GTS
4238  MiApp_WriteData(0x00); // Pending addresses
4239  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_PROTOCOL_ID); // Protocol ID
4240  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_VERSION_NUM); // Version Number
4241  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
4242  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
4243  {
4244  MiApp_WriteData(AdditionalNodeID[i]);
4245  }
4246  #endif
4247 
4248  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4249  SendMACPacket(myPANID.v, NULL, PACKET_TYPE_RESERVE, MSK_ALT_SRC_ADDR);
4250  #else
4251  SendMACPacket(NULL, PACKET_TYPE_RESERVE);
4252  #endif
4253  }
4254  #endif

4256  /*********************************************************************
4257  * Function: BYTE SearchForLongAddress(void)
4258  *
4259  * PreCondition: tempLongAddress is set to the device
4260  * that you are looking for
4261  *
4262  * Input: None
4263  *
4264  * Output: BYTE - the index of the network table entry of the
4265  * requested device. 0xFF indicates that the requested
4266  * device doesn't exist in the network table
4267  *
4268  * Side Effects: None
4269  *
4270  * Overview: This function looks up the index of a node or network
4271  * in the network table by long address.
4272  ********************************************************************/
4273  BYTE SearchForLongAddress(void)
4274  {
4275  BYTE i,j;
4276 
4277  for(i=0;i<CONNECTION_SIZE;i++)
4278  {
4279  if(ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid && ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.longAddressValid)
4280  {
4281  for(j=0;j<MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH;j++)
4282  {
4283  if(ConnectionTable[i].Address[j] != tempLongAddress[j])
4284  {
4285  goto EndOfSearchLoop;
4286  }
4287  }
4288  return i;
4289  }
4290 EndOfSearchLoop:
4291  ;
4292  }
4293  return 0xFF;
4294  }

4298  /*********************************************************************
4299  * Function: BYTE AddNodeToNetworkTable(void)
4300  *
4301  * PreCondition: tempLongAddress, tempShortAddress, tempPANID, and
4302  * tempNodeStatus are set to the correct values. If
4303  * tempNodeStatus.bits.longAddressValid is set then
4304  * tempLongAddress needs to be set. If
4305  * tempNodeStatus.bits.shortAddressValid is set then
4306  * tempShortAddress and tempPANID need to be set.
4307  *
4308  * Input: None
4309  *
4310  * Output: BYTE - the index of the network table entry
4311  * where the device was inserted. 0xFF indicates that
4312  * the requested device couldn't be inserted into the table
4313  *
4314  * Side Effects: Network table is updated with the devices info
4315  *
4316  * Overview: This function is used to insert new device into the
4317  * network table (or update already existing entries)
4318  ********************************************************************/
4319  BYTE AddNodeToNetworkTable(void)
4320  {
4321  BYTE handle = 0xFF;
4322 
4323  if(tempNodeStatus.bits.longAddressValid)
4324  {
4325  handle = SearchForLongAddress();
4326  }
4327  else
4328  {
4329  if(tempNodeStatus.bits.shortAddressValid)
4330  {
4331  handle = SearchForShortAddress();
4332  }
4333  }
4334 
4335  if(handle==0xFF)
4336  {
4337  handle = findNextNetworkEntry();
4338  }
4339 
4340  if(handle != 0xFF)
4341  {
4342  //isFamily = 1, RxOnWhenIdle = 1, Is a neighbor and not a network,
4343  //not a P2P connection, short and long addresses valid as well
4344  //as the entire entry
4345 
4346  //If it is not family then update the node information
4347  ConnectionTable[handle].status.Val = tempNodeStatus.Val;
4348  if(tempNodeStatus.bits.longAddressValid)
4349  {
4350  BYTE i;
4351  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
4352  {
4353  ConnectionTable[handle].Address[i] = tempLongAddress[i];
4354  }
4355  }
4356 
4357  if(tempNodeStatus.bits.shortAddressValid)
4358  {
4359  ConnectionTable[handle].AltAddress.Val = tempShortAddress.Val;
4360  }
4361 
4362  ConnectionTable[handle].PANID.Val = tempPANID.Val;
4363  #if defined(ENABLE_SECURITY)
4364  IncomingFrameCounter[handle].Val = 0;
4365  #endif
4366  }
4367 
4368  return handle;
4369  }

4371  /*********************************************************************
4372  * BOOL isSameAddress(BYTE *Address1, BYTE *Address2)
4373  *
4374  * Overview: This function compares two long addresses and returns
4375  * the boolean to indicate if they are the same
4376  *
4377  * PreCondition:
4378  *
4379  * Input:
4380  * Address1 - Pointer to the first long address to be compared
4381  * Address2 - Pointer to the second long address to be compared
4382  *
4383  * Output:
4384  * If the two address are the same
4385  *
4386  * Side Effects:
4387  *
4388  ********************************************************************/
4389  BOOL isSameAddress(INPUT BYTE *Address1, INPUT BYTE *Address2)
4390  {
4391  BYTE i;
4392 
4393  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
4394  {
4395  if( Address1[i] != Address2[i] )
4396  {
4397  return FALSE;
4398  }
4399  }
4400  return TRUE;
4401  }

4404  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
4405  /*********************************************************************
4406  * BOOL CheckForData(void)
4407  *
4408  * Overview: This function sends out a Data Request to the peer
4409  * device of the first P2P connection.
4410  *
4411  * PreCondition: Transceiver is initialized and fully waken up
4412  *
4413  * Input: None
4414  *
4415  * Output: None
4416  *
4417  * Side Effects: The P2P stack is waiting for the response from
4418  * the peer device. A data request timer has been
4419  * started. In case there is no response from the
4420  * peer device, the data request will time-out itself
4421  *
4422  ********************************************************************/
4423  BOOL CheckForData(void)
4424  {
4425  BYTE tmpTxData = TxData;
4426 
4427  MAC_FlushTx();
4428  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_DATA_REQUEST);
4429 
4430  #if defined(ENABLE_ENHANCED_DATA_REQUEST)
4431  if( tmpTxData > PAYLOAD_START )
4432  {
4433  TxData = tmpTxData;
4434 
4435  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
4436  MTP.flags.bits.packetType = PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND;
4437  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
4438  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
4439  if( (TxBuffer[1] & 0x01) > 0 )
4440  {
4441  MTP.flags.bits.secEn = 1;
4442  TxBuffer[1] &= 0xFE;
4443  }
4444 
4445  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4446  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
4447  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
4448 
4449  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[myParent].PANID.Val;
4450  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v;
4451  #else
4452 
4453  {
4454  BYTE i;
4455  for(i = tmpTxData; i > 1; i--)
4456  {
4457  TxBuffer[i+1] = TxBuffer[i-1];
4458  }
4459  TxData += 2;
4460  }
4461  TxBuffer[1] = myShortAddress.v[0];
4462  TxBuffer[2] = myShortAddress.v[1];
4463  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].Address;
4464  #endif
4465  if( MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData) )
4466  {
4467  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.DataRequesting = 1;
4468  DataRequestTimer = MiWi_TickGet();
4469  return TRUE;
4470  }
4471  return FALSE;
4472  }
4473  #endif
4474 
4475  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4476  if( SendMACPacket(ConnectionTable[0].PANID.v, ConnectionTable[0].AltAddress.v, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND, MSK_ALT_DST_ADDR|MSK_ALT_SRC_ADDR) )
4477  #else
4478  MiApp_WriteData(myShortAddress.v[0]);
4479  MiApp_WriteData(myShortAddress.v[1]);
4480 
4481  if( SendMACPacket(ConnectionTable[0].Address, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND) )
4482  #endif
4483  {
4484  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.DataRequesting = 1;
4485  DataRequestTimer = MiWi_TickGet();
4486  TxData = tmpTxData;
4487  #if defined(ENABLE_TIME_SYNC)
4488  #if defined(__18CXX)
4489  TMR3H = 0;
4490  TMR3L = 0;
4491  #elif defined(__dsPIC33F__) || defined(__PIC24F__) || defined(__PIC24FK__) || defined(__PIC24H__)
4492  PR1 = 0xFFFF;
4493  TMR1 = 0;
4494  #elif defined(__PIC32MX__)
4495  PR1 = 0xFFFF;
4496  while(T1CONbits.TWIP) ;
4497  TMR1 = 0;
4498  #endif
4499  #endif
4500  return TRUE;
4501  }
4502  TxData = tmpTxData;
4503  return FALSE;
4504  }
4505  #endif

4511  {

4514 
4515  #if defined(ENABLE_NVM_MAC)

4519  {
4520  EEPROMRead(&(myLongAddress[MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH-1-i]), EEPROM_MAC_ADDR+i, 1);
4521  }
4522  myLongAddress[4] = 0xFF;
4523  if( MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH > 7 )
4524  {
4525  myLongAddress[3] = 0xFE;
4526  }
4527  for(i = 0; i < 3; i++)
4528  {
4529  EEPROMRead(&(myLongAddress[2-i]), EEPROM_MAC_ADDR+3+i, 1);
4530  }
4531  }
4532  else
4533  {
4534  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
4535  {
4536  EEPROMRead(&(myLongAddress[MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH-1-i]), EEPROM_MAC_ADDR+i, 1);
4537  }
4538  }
4539 
4540  #endif
4541

4578  {

4580  }
4581  #endif

4602  if( currentChannel >= 32 )

4604  return FALSE;

4610  return FALSE;

4719  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
4720  /************************************************************************************
4721  * Function:
4722  * BYTE MiApp_TransceiverPowerState(BYTE Mode)
4723  *
4724  * Summary:
4725  * This function put the RF transceiver into different power state. i.e. Put the
4726  * RF transceiver into sleep or wake it up.
4727  *
4728  * Description:
4729  * This is the primary user interface functions for the application layer to
4730  * put RF transceiver into sleep or wake it up. This function is only available
4731  * to those wireless nodes that may have to disable the transceiver to save
4732  * battery power.
4733  *
4734  * PreCondition:
4735  * Protocol initialization has been done.
4736  *
4737  * Parameters:
4738  * BYTE Mode - The mode of power state for the RF transceiver to be set. The possible
4739  * power states are following
4740  * * POWER_STATE_SLEEP The deep sleep mode for RF transceiver
4741  * * POWER_STATE_WAKEUP Wake up state, or operating state for RF transceiver
4742  * * POWER_STATE_WAKEUP_DR Put device into wakeup mode and then transmit a
4743  * data request to the device's associated device
4744  *
4745  * Returns:
4746  * The status of the operation. The following are the possible status
4747  * * SUCCESS Operation successful
4748  * * ERR_TRX_FAIL Transceiver fails to go to sleep or wake up
4749  * * ERR_TX_FAIL Transmission of Data Request command failed. Only available if the
4750  * input mode is POWER_STATE_WAKEUP_DR.
4751  * * ERR_RX_FAIL Failed to receive any response to Data Request command. Only available
4752  * if input mode is POWER_STATE_WAKEUP_DR.
4753  * * ERR_INVLAID_INPUT Invalid input mode.
4754  *
4755  * Example:
4756  * <code>
4757  * // put RF transceiver into sleep
4758  * MiApp_TransceiverPowerState(POWER_STATE_SLEEP;
4759  *
4760  * // Put the MCU into sleep
4761  * Sleep();
4762  *
4763  * // wakes up the MCU by WDT, external interrupt or any other means
4764  *
4765  * // make sure that RF transceiver to wake up and send out Data Request
4766  * MiApp_TransceiverPowerState(POWER_STATE_WAKEUP_DR);
4767  * </code>
4768  *
4769  * Remarks:
4770  * None
4771  *
4772  *****************************************************************************************/
4773  BYTE MiApp_TransceiverPowerState(BYTE Mode)
4774  {
4775  BYTE status;
4776 
4777  switch(Mode)
4778  {
4779  case POWER_STATE_SLEEP:
4780  {
4781  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
4782  if( MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveConnectionTable )
4783  {
4784  nvmPutConnectionTable(ConnectionTable);
4785  MiWiPRONVMStatus.bits.saveConnectionTable = 0;
4786  }
4787  #endif
4788  if( MiMAC_PowerState(POWER_STATE_DEEP_SLEEP) )
4789  {
4790  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping = 1;
4791  return SUCCESS;
4792  }
4793  return ERR_TRX_FAIL;
4794  }
4795 
4796  case POWER_STATE_WAKEUP:
4797  {
4798  if( MiMAC_PowerState(POWER_STATE_OPERATE) )
4799  {
4800  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping = 0;
4801  return SUCCESS;
4802  }
4803  return ERR_TRX_FAIL;
4804  }
4805 
4806  case POWER_STATE_WAKEUP_DR:
4807  {
4808  if( FALSE == MiMAC_PowerState(POWER_STATE_OPERATE) )
4809  {
4810  return ERR_TRX_FAIL;
4811  }
4812 
4813  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping = 0;
4814  if( CheckForData() == FALSE )
4815  {
4816  return ERR_TX_FAIL;
4817  }
4818  while( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.DataRequesting )
4819  {
4820  MiWiPROTasks();
4821  }
4822  return SUCCESS;
4823  }
4824 
4825  default:
4826  break;
4827  }
4828 
4829  return ERR_INVALID_INPUT;
4830  }
4831  #endif
4832

4848 /************************************************************************************
4849  * Function:
4850  * void MiApp_ConnectionMode(BYTE Mode)
4851  *
4852  * Summary:
4853  * This function set the current connection mode.
4854  *
4855  * Description:
4856  * This is the primary user interface function for the application layer to
4857  * configure the way that the host device accept connection request.
4858  *
4859  * PreCondition:
4860  * Protocol initialization has been done.
4861  *
4862  * Parameters:
4863  * BYTE Mode - The mode to accept connection request. The privilege for those modes
4864  * decreases gradually as defined. The higher privilege mode has all the
4865  * rights of the lower privilege modes.
4866  * The possible modes are
4867  * * ENABLE_ALL_CONN Enable response to all connection request
4868  * * ENABLE_PREV_CONN Enable response to connection request
4869  * from device already in the connection
4870  * table.
4871  * * ENABLE_ACTIVE_SCAN_RSP Enable response to active scan only
4872  * * DISABLE_ALL_CONN Disable response to connection request, including
4873  * an acitve scan request.
4874  *
4875  * Returns:
4876  * None
4877  *
4878  * Example:
4879  * <code>
4880  * // Enable all connection request
4881  * MiApp_ConnectionMode(ENABLE_ALL_CONN);
4882  * </code>
4883  *
4884  * Remarks:
4885  * None
4886  *
4887  *****************************************************************************************/
4888 void MiApp_ConnectionMode(INPUT BYTE Mode)
4889 {
4890  if( Mode > 3 )
4891  {
4892  return;
4893  }
4894  ConnMode = Mode;
4895  MiWiPROCapacityInfo.bits.ConnMode = ConnMode;
4896 
4897  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
4898  nvmPutConnMode(&ConnMode);
4899  #endif
4900 }

4904 /************************************************************************************
4905  * Function:
4906  * BYTE MiApp_SearchConnection(BYTE ScanDuartion, DWORD ChannelMap)
4907  *
4908  * Summary:
4909  * This function perform an active scan to locate operating PANs in the
4910  * neighborhood.
4911  *
4912  * Description:
4913  * This is the primary user interface function for the application layer to
4914  * perform an active scan. After this function call, all active scan response
4915  * will be stored in the global variable ActiveScanResults in the format of
4916  * structure ACTIVE_SCAN_RESULT. The return value indicates the total number
4917  * of valid active scan response in the active scan result array.
4918  *
4919  * PreCondition:
4920  * Protocol initialization has been done.
4921  *
4922  * Parameters:
4923  * BYTE ScanDuration - The maximum time to perform scan on single channel. The
4924  * value is from 5 to 14. The real time to perform scan can
4925  * be calculated in following formula from IEEE 802.15.4
4926  * specification
4927  * 960 * (2^ScanDuration + 1) * 10^(-6) second
4928  * DWORD ChannelMap - The bit map of channels to perform noise scan. The 32-bit
4929  * double word parameter use one bit to represent corresponding
4930  * channels from 0 to 31. For instance, 0x00000003 represent to
4931  * scan channel 0 and channel 1.
4932  *
4933  * Returns:
4934  * The number of valid active scan response stored in the global variable ActiveScanResults.
4935  *
4936  * Example:
4937  * <code>
4938  * // Perform an active scan on all possible channels
4939  * NumOfActiveScanResponse = MiApp_SearchConnection(10, 0xFFFFFFFF);
4940  * </code>
4941  *
4942  * Remarks:
4943  * None
4944  *
4945  *****************************************************************************************/
4946 BYTE MiApp_SearchConnection(INPUT BYTE ScanDuration, INPUT DWORD ChannelMap)
4947 {
4948  BYTE i;
4949  DWORD channelMask = 0x00000001;
4950  BYTE backupChannel = currentChannel;
4951  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
4952 
4953  for(i = 0; i < ACTIVE_SCAN_RESULT_SIZE; i++)
4954  {
4955  ActiveScanResults[i].Channel = 0xFF;
4956  }
4957  ActiveScanResultIndex = 0;
4958  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.searchingForNetwork = 1;
4959 
4960  i = 0;
4961  while(i < 32 )
4962  {
4963  if( ChannelMap & FULL_CHANNEL_MAP & (channelMask << i) )
4964  {
4965  Printf("\r\nScan Channel ");
4966  PrintDec(i);
4967  /* choose appropriate channel */
4968  MiApp_SetChannel( i );
4969 
4970  MAC_FlushTx();
4971  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_BEACON_REQUEST);
4972  MiApp_WriteData(currentChannel);
4973  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
4974  tempPANID.Val = 0xFFFF;
4975  SendMACPacket(tempPANID.v, NULL, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND, 0);
4976  #else
4977  SendMACPacket(NULL, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND);
4978  #endif
4979 
4980  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
4981  while(1)
4982  {
4983  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
4984  {
4985  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
4986  }
4987  //MiWiPROTasks();
4988  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
4989  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > ((DWORD)(ScanTime[ScanDuration])) )
4990  {
4991  // if scan time exceed scan duration, prepare to scan the next channel
4992  break;
4993  }
4994  }
4995 
4996  }
4997  i++;
4998  }
4999 
5000  MiApp_SetChannel(backupChannel);
5001  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.searchingForNetwork = 0;
5002 
5003  return ActiveScanResultIndex;
5004 }

5013 /************************************************************************************
5014  * Function:
5015  * BYTE MiApp_EstablishConnection(BYTE ActiveScanIndex, BYTE Mode)
5016  *
5017  * Summary:
5018  * This function establish a connection with one or more nodes in an existing
5019  * PAN.
5020  *
5021  * Description:
5022  * This is the primary user interface function for the application layer to
5023  * start communication with an existing PAN. For P2P protocol, this function
5024  * call can establish one or more connections. For network protocol, this
5025  * function can be used to join the network, or establish a virtual socket
5026  * connection with a node out of the radio range. There are multiple ways to
5027  * establish connection(s), all depends on the input parameters.
5028  *
5029  * PreCondition:
5030  * Protocol initialization has been done. If only to establish connection with
5031  * a predefined device, an active scan must be performed before and valid active
5032  * scan result has been saved.
5033  *
5034  * Parameters:
5035  * BYTE ActiveScanIndex - The index of the target device in the ActiveScanResults
5036  * array, if a predefined device is targeted. If the
5037  * value of ActiveScanIndex is 0xFF, the protocol stack will
5038  * try to establish a connection with any device.
5039  * BYTE Mode - The mode to establish a connection. This parameter is generally valid in
5040  * a network protocol. The possible modes are:
5041  * * CONN_MODE_DIRECT Establish a connection without radio range.
5042  * * CONN_MODE_INDIRECT Establish a virtual connection with a device
5043  * that may be in or out of the radio range. This
5044  * mode sometimes is called cluster socket, which
5045  * is only valid for network protocol. The PAN
5046  * Coordinator will be involved to establish a
5047  * virtual indirect socket connection.
5048  *
5049  * Returns:
5050  * The index of the peer device on the connection table.
5051  *
5052  * Example:
5053  * <code>
5054  * // Establish one or more connections with any device
5055  * PeerIndex = MiApp_EstablishConnection(0xFF, CONN_MODE_DIRECT);
5056  * </code>
5057  *
5058  * Remarks:
5059  * If more than one connections have been established through this function call, the
5060  * return value points to the index of one of the peer devices.
5061  *
5062  *****************************************************************************************/
5063 BYTE MiApp_EstablishConnection(INPUT BYTE ActiveScanIndex, INPUT BYTE Mode)
5064 {
5065  BYTE retry = CONNECTION_RETRY_TIMES;
5066  BYTE i;
5067  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
5068 
5069  if( Mode == CONN_MODE_INDIRECT )
5070  {
5071  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
5072  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();;
5073  #endif
5074  OpenSocket();
5075  while(openSocketInfo.status.bits.requestIsOpen)
5076  {
5077  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
5078  {
5079  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
5080  }
5081  //MiWiPROTasks();
5082  #if defined(ENABLE_SLEEP) && defined(NWK_ROLE_END_DEVICE)
5083  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
5084  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > OPEN_SOCKET_POLL_INTERVAL )
5085  {
5086  CheckForData();
5087  t1.Val = t2.Val;
5088  }
5089  #endif
5090  }
5091  if( openSocketInfo.status.bits.matchFound )
5092  {
5093  return openSocketInfo.socketHandle;
5094  }
5095  return 0xFF;
5096  }
5097  else if( Mode == CONN_MODE_DIRECT)
5098  {
5099  if( ActiveScanIndex == 0xFF )
5100  {
5101  while( MiApp_SearchConnection(10, ((DWORD)0x00000001)<<currentChannel) == 0 )
5102  {
5103  if( --retry == 0 )
5104  {
5105  return 0xFF;
5106  }
5107  }
5108  ActiveScanIndex = 0;
5109  }
5110 
5111  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5112  tempPANID.Val = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].PANID.Val;
5113  tempShortAddress.v[0] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Address[0];
5114  tempShortAddress.v[1] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Address[1];
5115  myParent = SearchForShortAddress();
5116  #else
5117  tempPANID.Val = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].PANID.Val;
5118  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
5119  {
5120  tempLongAddress[i] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Address[i];
5121  }
5122  myParent = SearchForLongAddress();
5123  #endif
5124 
5125  if( myParent == 0xFF )
5126  {
5127  if( (myParent = findNextNetworkEntry()) == 0xFF )
5128  {
5129  return 0xFF;
5130  }
5131  }
5132 
5133  ConnectionTable[myParent].status.Val = 0;
5134  ConnectionTable[myParent].PANID.Val = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].PANID.Val;
5135  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5136  ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v[0] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Address[0];
5137  ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v[1] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Address[1];
5138  ConnectionTable[myParent].status.bits.shortAddressValid = 1;
5139  #else
5140  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
5141  {
5142  ConnectionTable[myParent].Address[i] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Address[i];
5143  }
5144  ConnectionTable[myParent].status.bits.longAddressValid = 1;
5145  #endif
5146  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
5147  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
5148  {
5149  ConnectionTable[myParent].PeerInfo[i] = ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].PeerInfo[i];
5150  }
5151  #endif
5152 
5153  ConnectionTable[myParent].status.bits.directConnection = 1;
5154  ConnectionTable[myParent].status.bits.isFamily = 1;
5155  ConnectionTable[myParent].status.bits.RXOnWhenIdle = 1;
5156 
5157  MiApp_SetChannel(ActiveScanResults[ActiveScanIndex].Channel);
5158 
5159  /* Program the PANID to the attempted network */
5160  myPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[myParent].PANID.Val;
5161  tempShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFF;
5162  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(tempShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
5163 
5164 
5165  MAC_FlushTx();
5166  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_ASSOCIATION_REQUEST);
5167  MiApp_WriteData(MiWiPROCapacityInfo.Val);
5168  #if ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE > 0
5169  for(i = 0; i < ADDITIONAL_NODE_ID_SIZE; i++)
5170  {
5171  MiApp_WriteData(AdditionalNodeID[i]);
5172  }
5173  #endif
5174 
5175  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5176  SendMACPacket(ConnectionTable[myParent].PANID.v, ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND, MSK_ALT_DST_ADDR);
5177  #else
5178  SendMACPacket(ConnectionTable[myParent].Address, PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND);
5179  #endif
5180 
5181  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
5182  while(ConnectionTable[myParent].status.bits.FinishJoin == 0 )
5183  {
5184  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
5185  {
5186  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
5187  }
5188  //MiWiPROTasks();
5189  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
5190  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > ONE_SECOND )
5191  {
5192  return 0xFF;
5193  }
5194  }
5195 
5196  #if defined(ENABLE_TIME_SYNC) && !defined(ENABLE_SLEEP) && defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)
5197  TimeSyncTick = MiWi_TickGet();
5198  #endif
5199  return myParent;
5200  }
5201  return 0xFF;
5202 }
5203 
5204 BOOL MiApp_MessageAvailable(void)
5205 {
5206  MiWiPROTasks();
5207 
5208  return MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.RxHasUserData;
5209 }
5210 
5211 void MiApp_DiscardMessage(void)
5212 {
5213  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.RxHasUserData = 0;
5214  MiMAC_DiscardPacket();
5215 }

5219 /************************************************************************************
5220  * Function:
5221  * BOOL MiApp_BroadcastPacket(BOOL SecEn )
5222  *
5223  * Summary:
5224  * This function broadcast a message in the TxBuffer.
5225  *
5226  * Description:
5227  * This is the primary user interface function for the application layer to
5228  * broadcast a message. The application payload is filled in the global char
5229  * array TxBuffer.
5230  *
5231  * PreCondition:
5232  * Protocol initialization has been done.
5233  *
5234  * Parameters:
5235  * BOOL SecEn - The boolean indicates if the application payload needs to be
5236  * secured before transmission.
5237  *
5238  * Returns:
5239  * A boolean to indicates if the broadcast procedure is succcessful.
5240  *
5241  * Example:
5242  * <code>
5243  * // Secure and then broadcast the message stored in TxBuffer
5244  * MiApp_BroadcastPacket(TRUE);
5245  * </code>
5246  *
5247  * Remarks:
5248  * None
5249  *
5250  *****************************************************************************************/
5251 BOOL MiApp_BroadcastPacket( INPUT BOOL SecEn )
5252 {
5253  return MultiCast(BROADCAST_TO_ALL, SecEn);
5254 }
5255 
5256 
5257 BOOL MultiCast( INPUT BYTE MultiCastMode, INPUT BOOL SecEn )
5258 {
5259  TxBuffer[0] = defaultHops;
5260  TxBuffer[1] = 0x02;
5261  TxBuffer[2] = myPANID.v[0];
5262  TxBuffer[3] = myPANID.v[1];
5263  switch( MultiCastMode )
5264  {
5265  case BROADCAST_TO_ALL:
5266  TxBuffer[4] = 0xFF;
5267  break;
5268 
5269  case MULTICAST_TO_FFDS:
5270  TxBuffer[4] = 0xFE;
5271  break;
5272 
5273  case MULTICAST_TO_COORDINATORS:
5274  TxBuffer[4] = 0xFD;
5275  break;
5276 
5277  default:
5278  return FALSE;
5279  }
5280  TxBuffer[5] = 0xFF;
5281  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0];
5282  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1];
5283  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0];
5284  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1];
5285  TxBuffer[10] = MiWiPROSeqNum++;
5286 
5287  #if defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE) && defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
5288  if( MultiCastMode == BROADCAST_TO_ALL )
5289  {
5290  BYTE i;
5291 
5292  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
5293  {
5294  if( ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid && ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.RXOnWhenIdle == 0 )
5295  {
5296  break;
5297  }
5298  }
5299 
5300  if( i < CONNECTION_SIZE )
5301  {
5302  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5303  SaveIndirectMessage(TRUE, myPANID, NULL, FALSE, SecEn);
5304  #else
5305  SaveIndirectMessage(TRUE, NULL, FALSE, SecEn);
5306  #endif
5307  }
5308  }
5309  #endif
5310 
5311  #if defined(ENABLE_ENHANCED_DATA_REQUEST) && defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
5312  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping )
5313  {
5314  if( SecEn )
5315  {
5316  TxBuffer[1] |= 1;
5317  }
5318  return TRUE;
5319  }
5320  #endif
5321 
5322  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
5323  MTP.flags.bits.broadcast = 1;
5324  MTP.flags.bits.secEn = SecEn;
5325 
5326 
5327  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5328  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
5329  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
5330  #else
5331  if(MultiCastMode == MULTICAST_TO_COORDINATORS)
5332  {
5333  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
5334  }
5335  #endif
5336 
5337  return MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
5338 }

5340 
5341 /************************************************************************************
5342  * Function:
5343  * BOOL MiApp_UnicastConnection(BYTE ConnectionIndex, BOOL SecEn)
5344  *
5345  * Summary:
5346  * This function unicast a message in the TxBuffer to the device with the input
5347  * ConnectionIndex in the connection table.
5348  *
5349  * Description:
5350  * This is one of the primary user interface functions for the application layer to
5351  * unicast a message. The destination device is in the connection table specified by
5352  * the input parameter ConnectionIndex. The application payload is filled in the
5353  * global char array TxBuffer.
5354  *
5355  * PreCondition:
5356  * Protocol initialization has been done. The input parameter ConnectionIndex points to
5357  * a valid peer device in the connection table.
5358  *
5359  * Parameters:
5360  * BYTE ConnectionIndex - The index of the destination device in the connection table.
5361  * BOOL SecEn - The boolean indicates if the application payload needs to be
5362  * secured before transmission.
5363  *
5364  * Returns:
5365  * A boolean to indicates if the unicast procedure is succcessful.
5366  *
5367  * Example:
5368  * <code>
5369  * // Secure and then unicast the message stored in TxBuffer to the first device in
5370  * // the connection table
5371  * MiApp_UnicastConnection(0, TRUE);
5372  * </code>
5373  *
5374  * Remarks:
5375  * None
5376  *
5377  *****************************************************************************************/
5378 BOOL MiApp_UnicastConnection( INPUT BYTE ConnectionIndex,
5379  INPUT BOOL SecEn)
5380 {
5381  BYTE MiWiPROFrameControl;
5382 
5383  if( ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].status.bits.isValid == 0 )
5384  {
5385  return FALSE;
5386  }
5387  if( MiWiPROAckRequired && TxBuffer[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN])
5388  {
5389  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 1;
5390  AcknowledgementSeq = MiWiPROSeqNum;
5391  AcknowledgementAddr.Val = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.Val;
5392  MiWiPROFrameControl = 0x06;
5393  }
5394  else
5395  {
5396  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5397  MiWiPROFrameControl = 0x02;
5398  }
5399 
5400  TxBuffer[0] = defaultHops; //number of hops
5401  TxBuffer[1] = MiWiPROFrameControl; //Frame Control
5402  TxBuffer[2] = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].PANID.v[0];
5403  TxBuffer[3] = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].PANID.v[1];
5404  TxBuffer[4] = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.v[0];
5405  TxBuffer[5] = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.v[1];
5406  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
5407  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
5408  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
5409  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB
5410  TxBuffer[10] = MiWiPROSeqNum++; //sequence number
5411 
5412  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
5413  if( FALSE == RouteMessage(ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].PANID, ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress, SecEn) )
5414  {
5415  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5416  return FALSE;
5417  }
5418  else if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress &&
5419  (ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.v[0] < 0x80))
5420  {
5421  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
5422  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
5423  while(1)
5424  {
5425  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
5426  {
5427  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
5428  }
5429  //MiWiPROTasks();
5430  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress == 0 )
5431  {
5432  return TRUE;
5433  }
5434  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
5435  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > MIWI_PRO_ACK_TIMEOUT )
5436  {
5437  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5438  return FALSE;
5439  }
5440  }
5441  }
5442  return TRUE;
5443  #else
5444  // for end device, always send the message to its parent
5445  #if defined(ENABLE_ENHANCED_DATA_REQUEST) && defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
5446  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping )
5447  {
5448  if( SecEn )
5449  {
5450  TxBuffer[1] |= 1;
5451  }
5452  return TRUE;
5453  }
5454  #endif
5455 
5456  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
5457  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
5458  MTP.flags.bits.secEn = SecEn;
5459 
5460  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5461  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
5462  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
5463  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].AltAddress.v;
5464  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[myParent].PANID.Val;
5465  #else
5466  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].Address;
5467  #endif
5468 
5469  if( MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData) == FALSE )
5470  {
5471  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5472  return FALSE;
5473  }
5474 
5475  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress &&
5476  (ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.v[0] < 0x80) )
5477  {
5478  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
5479  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
5480  while(1)
5481  {
5482  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
5483  {
5484  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
5485  }
5486  //MiWiPROTasks();
5487  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress == 0 )
5488  {
5489  return TRUE;
5490  }
5491  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
5492  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > MIWI_PRO_ACK_TIMEOUT )
5493  {
5494  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5495  return FALSE;
5496  }
5497  }
5498  }
5499  return TRUE;
5500  #endif
5501 }

5505 BOOL MiApp_UnicastAddress(BYTE *DestAddress, BOOL PermanentAddr, BOOL SecEn)
5506 {
5507  BYTE handle;
5508  BYTE i;
5509  BYTE MiWiPROFrameControl;
5510 
5511  if(PermanentAddr == FALSE)
5512  {
5513  tempShortAddress.v[0] = DestAddress[0];
5514  tempShortAddress.v[1] = DestAddress[1];
5515  if( tempShortAddress.Val > 0xFFFC )
5516  {
5517  switch(tempShortAddress.Val)
5518  {
5519  case 0xFFFF:
5520  return MultiCast(BROADCAST_TO_ALL, SecEn);
5521 
5522  case 0xFFFE:
5523  return MultiCast(MULTICAST_TO_FFDS, SecEn);
5524 
5525  case 0xFFFD:
5526  return MultiCast(MULTICAST_TO_COORDINATORS, SecEn);
5527 
5528  default:
5529  return FALSE;
5530  }
5531  }
5532  }
5533 
5534 
5535  if( MiWiPROAckRequired && TxBuffer[MIWI_PRO_HEADER_LEN])
5536  {
5537  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 1;
5538  AcknowledgementSeq = MiWiPROSeqNum;
5539  MiWiPROFrameControl = 0x06;
5540  }
5541  else
5542  {
5543  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5544  MiWiPROFrameControl = 0x02;
5545  }
5546 
5547  if( PermanentAddr )
5548  {
5549  for(i = 0; i < MY_ADDRESS_LENGTH; i++)
5550  {
5551  tempLongAddress[i] = DestAddress[i];
5552  }
5553  if( (handle = SearchForLongAddress()) == 0xFF )
5554  {
5555 DIRECT_LONG_ADDRESS:
5556 
5557  TxBuffer[0] = defaultHops; //number of hops
5558  TxBuffer[1] = 0x02; //Frame Control
5559  TxBuffer[2] = 0xFF;
5560  TxBuffer[3] = 0xFF;
5561  TxBuffer[4] = 0xFF;
5562  TxBuffer[5] = 0xFF;
5563  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
5564  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
5565  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
5566  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB
5567  TxBuffer[10] = MiWiPROSeqNum++; //sequence number
5568 
5569  #if defined(ENABLE_ENHANCED_DATA_REQUEST) && defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
5570  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping )
5571  {
5572  if( SecEn )
5573  {
5574  TxBuffer[1] |= 1;
5575  }
5576  return TRUE;
5577  }
5578  #endif
5579 
5580  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
5581  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
5582  MTP.flags.bits.secEn = SecEn;
5583  MTP.DestAddress = DestAddress;
5584 
5585  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
5586  MTP.altDestAddr = FALSE;
5587  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
5588  MTP.DestPANID.Val = myPANID.Val;
5589  #endif
5590  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5591  return MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
5592  }
5593  else
5594  {
5595  if( ConnectionTable[handle].status.bits.shortAddressValid == 0 )
5596  {
5597  goto DIRECT_LONG_ADDRESS;
5598  }
5599 
5600  if( MiWiPROAckRequired )
5601  {
5602  AcknowledgementAddr.Val = ConnectionTable[handle].AltAddress.Val;
5603  }
5604 
5605  TxBuffer[0] = defaultHops; //number of hops
5606  TxBuffer[1] = MiWiPROFrameControl; //Frame Control
5607  TxBuffer[2] = ConnectionTable[handle].PANID.v[0];
5608  TxBuffer[3] = ConnectionTable[handle].PANID.v[1];
5609  TxBuffer[4] = ConnectionTable[handle].AltAddress.v[0];
5610  TxBuffer[5] = ConnectionTable[handle].AltAddress.v[1];
5611  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
5612  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
5613  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
5614  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB
5615  TxBuffer[10] = MiWiPROSeqNum++; //sequence number
5616  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
5617  if( FALSE == RouteMessage(ConnectionTable[handle].PANID, ConnectionTable[handle].AltAddress, SecEn) )
5618  {
5619  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5620  return FALSE;
5621  }
5622 
5623  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress )
5624  {
5625  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
5626  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
5627  while(1)
5628  {
5629  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
5630  {
5631  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
5632  }
5633  //MiWiPROTasks();
5634  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress == 0 )
5635  {
5636  return TRUE;
5637  }
5638  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
5639  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > MIWI_PRO_ACK_TIMEOUT )
5640  {
5641  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5642  return FALSE;
5643  }
5644  }
5645  }
5646  return TRUE;
5647  #else
5648  // for end device, always send data to its parent
5649 
5650  #if defined(ENABLE_ENHANCED_DATA_REQUEST) && defined(ENABLE_SLEEP)
5651  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Sleeping )
5652  {
5653  if( SecEn )
5654  {
5655  TxBuffer[1] |= 1;
5656  }
5657  return TRUE;
5658  }
5659  #endif
5660

5662  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;

5664 
5665  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)

5668  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;

5670  #else
5671  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[myParent].Address;
5672  #endif
5673 
5674 
5675  if( MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData) == FALSE )
5676  {
5677  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress = 0;
5678  return FALSE;
5679  }
5680 
5681  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.MiWiPROAckInProgress )
5682  {
5683  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
5684  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
5685  while(1)
5686  {
5687  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
5688  {
5689  MiApp_DiscardMessage();

5691  //MiWiPROTasks();

5700  return FALSE;
5701  }
5702  }
5703  }
5704  return TRUE;
5705  #endif
5706  }
5707  }
5708

5710  TxBuffer[1] = MiWiPROFrameControl; //Frame Control

5714  TxBuffer[5] = DestAddress[1];
5715  TxBuffer[6] = myPANID.v[0]; //source PANID LSB
5716  TxBuffer[7] = myPANID.v[1]; //source PANID MSB
5717  TxBuffer[8] = myShortAddress.v[0]; //source address LSB
5718  TxBuffer[9] = myShortAddress.v[1]; //source address MSB

5755  }
5756  }

5821 BOOL MiApp_StartConnection(BYTE Mode, BYTE ScanDuration, DWORD ChannelMap)
5822 {
5823  switch(Mode)
5824  {
5825  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
5826  case START_CONN_DIRECT:
5827  myShortAddress.Val = 0;
5828  myParent = 0xFF;
5829  #if MY_PAN_ID == 0xFFFF
5830  myPANID.v[0] = TMRL;
5831  myPANID.v[1] = TMRL+0x51;
5832  #else
5833  myPANID.Val = MY_PAN_ID;
5834  #endif
5835  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
5836  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 1;
5837  role = ROLE_PAN_COORDINATOR;
5838  MiWiPROCapacityInfo.bits.Role = role;
5839  FamilyTree[0] = 0;
5840  RoutingTable[0] = 0;
5841  NeighborRoutingTable[0][0] = 0;
5842  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
5843  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
5844  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);
5845  nvmPutRole(&role);
5846  nvmPutFamilyTree(FamilyTree);
5847  nvmPutRoutingTable(RoutingTable);
5848  nvmPutNeighborRoutingTable(NeighborRoutingTable);
5849  #endif
5850  #if defined(ENABLE_TIME_SYNC) && !defined(ENABLE_SLEEP) && defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)
5851  TimeSyncTick = MiWi_TickGet();
5852  #endif
5853  return TRUE;
5854  #endif
5855 
5856  case START_CONN_ENERGY_SCN:
5857  #if defined(ENABLE_ED_SCAN) && defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
5858  {
5859  BYTE channel;
5860  BYTE RSSIValue;
5861 
5862  channel = MiApp_NoiseDetection(ChannelMap, ScanDuration, NOISE_DETECT_ENERGY, &RSSIValue);
5863  MiApp_SetChannel(channel);
5864  Printf("\r\nStart Wireless Communication on Channel ");
5865  PrintDec(channel);
5866  Printf("\r\n");
5867  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 1;
5868  myShortAddress.Val = 0;
5869  myParent = 0xFF;
5870  #if MY_PAN_ID == 0xFFFF
5871  myPANID.v[0] = TMRL;
5872  myPANID.v[1] = TMRL+0x51;
5873  #else
5874  myPANID.Val = MY_PAN_ID;
5875  #endif
5876  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
5877  role = ROLE_PAN_COORDINATOR;
5878  MiWiPROCapacityInfo.bits.Role = role;
5879 
5880  FamilyTree[0] = 0;
5881  RoutingTable[0] = 0;
5882  NeighborRoutingTable[0][0] = 0;
5883  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
5884  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
5885  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);
5886  nvmPutRole(&role);
5887  nvmPutFamilyTree(FamilyTree);
5888  nvmPutRoutingTable(RoutingTable);
5889  nvmPutNeighborRoutingTable(NeighborRoutingTable);
5890  #endif
5891  #if defined(ENABLE_TIME_SYNC) && !defined(ENABLE_SLEEP) && defined(ENABLE_INDIRECT_MESSAGE)
5892  TimeSyncTick = MiWi_TickGet();
5893  #endif
5894  return TRUE;
5895  }
5896  #else
5897  return FALSE;
5898  #endif
5899 
5900  case START_CONN_CS_SCN:
5901  // Carrier sense scan is not supported for current available transceivers
5902  return FALSE;
5903 
5904  default:
5905  break;
5906  }
5907  return FALSE;
5908 }

5912  #ifdef ENABLE_ED_SCAN
5913  /************************************************************************************
5914  * Function:
5915  * BYTE MiApp_NoiseDetection( DWORD ChannelMap, BYTE ScanDuration,
5916  * BYTE DetectionMode, BYTE *NoiseLevel)
5917  *
5918  * Summary:
5919  * This function perform a noise scan and returns the channel with least noise
5920  *
5921  * Description:
5922  * This is the primary user interface functions for the application layer to
5923  * perform noise detection on multiple channels.
5924  *
5925  * PreCondition:
5926  * Protocol initialization has been done.
5927  *
5928  * Parameters:
5929  * DWORD ChannelMap - The bit map of channels to perform noise scan. The 32-bit
5930  * double word parameter use one bit to represent corresponding
5931  * channels from 0 to 31. For instance, 0x00000003 represent to
5932  * scan channel 0 and channel 1.
5933  * BYTE ScanDuration - The maximum time to perform scan on single channel. The
5934  * value is from 5 to 14. The real time to perform scan can
5935  * be calculated in following formula from IEEE 802.15.4
5936  * specification
5937  * 960 * (2^ScanDuration + 1) * 10^(-6) second
5938  * BYTE DetectionMode - The noise detection mode to perform the scan. The two possible
5939  * scan modes are
5940  * * NOISE_DETECT_ENERGY Energy detection scan mode
5941  * * NOISE_DETECT_CS Carrier sense detection scan mode
5942  * BYTE *NoiseLevel - The noise level at the channel with least noise level
5943  *
5944  * Returns:
5945  * The channel that has the lowest noise level
5946  *
5947  * Example:
5948  * <code>
5949  * BYTE NoiseLevel;
5950  * OptimalChannel = MiApp_NoiseDetection(0xFFFFFFFF, 10, NOISE_DETECT_ENERGY, &NoiseLevel);
5951  * </code>
5952  *
5953  * Remarks:
5954  * None
5955  *
5956  *****************************************************************************************/
5957  BYTE MiApp_NoiseDetection(INPUT DWORD ChannelMap, INPUT BYTE ScanDuration, INPUT BYTE DetectionMode, OUTPUT BYTE *RSSIValue)
5958  {
5959  BYTE i;
5960  BYTE OptimalChannel = 0xFF;
5961  BYTE minRSSI = 0xFF;
5962  DWORD channelMask = 0x00000001;
5963  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
5964 
5965  if( DetectionMode != NOISE_DETECT_ENERGY )
5966  {
5967  return 0xFF;
5968  }
5969 
5970  ConsolePutROMString((ROM char*)"\r\nEnergy Scan Results:");
5971  i = 0;
5972  while( i < 32 )
5973  {
5974  #if defined(ENABLE_FREQUENCY_AGILITY)
5975  EnergyScanResults[i] = 0xFF;
5976  #endif
5977  if( ChannelMap & FULL_CHANNEL_MAP & (channelMask << i) )
5978  {
5979  BYTE RSSIcheck;
5980  BYTE maxRSSI = 0;
5981  BYTE j, k;
5982 
5983  /* choose appropriate channel */
5984  MiApp_SetChannel(i);
5985 
5986  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
5987 
5988  while(1)
5989  {
5990  RSSIcheck = MiMAC_ChannelAssessment(CHANNEL_ASSESSMENT_ENERGY_DETECT);
5991  if( RSSIcheck > maxRSSI )
5992  {
5993  maxRSSI = RSSIcheck;
5994  }
5995 
5996  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
5997  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t1, t2) > ((DWORD)(ScanTime[ScanDuration])) )
5998  {
5999  // if scan time exceed scan duration, prepare to scan the next channel
6000  break;
6001  }
6002  }
6003 
6004  Printf("\r\nChannel ");
6005  PrintDec(i);
6006  Printf(": ");
6007  j = maxRSSI/5;
6008  for(k = 0; k < j; k++)
6009  {
6010  ConsolePut('-');
6011  }
6012  Printf(" ");
6013  PrintChar(maxRSSI);
6014 
6015  #if defined(ENABLE_FREQUENCY_AGILITY)
6016  EnergyScanResults[i] = maxRSSI;
6017  #endif
6018 
6019  if( maxRSSI < minRSSI )
6020  {
6021  minRSSI = maxRSSI;
6022  OptimalChannel = i;
6023  if( RSSIValue )
6024  {
6025  *RSSIValue = minRSSI;
6026  }
6027  }
6028  }
6029  i++;
6030  }
6031 
6032  return OptimalChannel;
6033  }
6034 
6035  #endif
6036 
6037 
6038  #if defined(ENABLE_FREQUENCY_AGILITY)
6039  /********************************************************************************************
6040  * Function:
6041  * BOOL MiApp_ResyncConnection(BYTE ConnectionIndex, DWORD ChannelMap)
6042  *
6043  * Summary:
6044  * This function tries to resynchronize the lost connection with
6045  * peers, probably due to channel hopping
6046  *
6047  * Description:
6048  * This is the primary user interface function for the application to resynchronize a
6049  * lost connection. For a RFD device that goes to sleep periodically, it may not
6050  * receive the channel hopping command that is sent when it is sleep. The sleeping
6051  * RFD device depends on this function to hop to the channel that the rest of
6052  * the PAN has jumped to. This function call is usually triggered by continously
6053  * communication failure with the peers.
6054  *
6055  * PreCondition:
6056  * Transceiver has been initialized
6057  *
6058  * Parameters:
6059  * DWORD ChannelMap - The bit map of channels to perform noise scan. The 32-bit
6060  * double word parameter use one bit to represent corresponding
6061  * channels from 0 to 31. For instance, 0x00000003 represent to
6062  * scan channel 0 and channel 1.
6063  *
6064  * Returns:
6065  * a boolean to indicate if resynchronization of connection is successful
6066  *
6067  * Example:
6068  * <code>
6069  * // Sleeping RFD device resync with its associated device, usually the first peer
6070  * // in the connection table
6071  * MiApp_ResyncConnection(0, 0xFFFFFFFF);
6072  * </code>
6073  *
6074  * Remark:
6075  * If operation is successful, the wireless node will be hopped to the channel that
6076  * the rest of the PAN is operating on.
6077  *
6078  *********************************************************************************************/
6079  BOOL MiApp_ResyncConnection(INPUT BYTE ConnectionIndex, INPUT DWORD ChannelMap)
6080  {
6081  BYTE i;
6082  BYTE j;
6083  BYTE backupChannel = currentChannel;
6084  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
6085 
6086  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
6087  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Resynning = 1;
6088  for(i = 0; i < RESYNC_TIMES; i++)
6089  {
6090  DWORD ChannelMask = 0x00000001;
6091 
6092  j = 0;
6093  while(MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Resynning)
6094  {
6095  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
6096 
6097  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > SCAN_DURATION_9 )
6098  {
6099  t1.Val = t2.Val;
6100 
6101  if( j > 31 )
6102  {
6103  break;
6104  }
6105 
6106  while( (ChannelMap & FULL_CHANNEL_MAP & (ChannelMask << j)) == 0 )
6107  {
6108  if( ++j > 31 )
6109  {
6110  goto GetOutOfLoop;
6111  }
6112  }
6113 
6114  Printf("\r\nChecking Channel ");
6115  PrintDec(j);
6116  MiApp_SetChannel(j);
6117  j++;
6118 
6119 
6120  MiApp_FlushTx();
6121  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE);
6122  MiApp_WriteData(RESYNCHRONIZATION_REQUEST);
6123  MiApp_WriteData(currentChannel);
6124  MiApp_UnicastConnection(ConnectionIndex, FALSE);
6125  }
6126  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
6127  {
6128  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
6129  }
6130  //MiWiPROTasks();
6131  }
6132  if( MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Resynning == 0 )
6133  {
6134  Printf("\r\nResynchronized Connection to Channel ");
6135  PrintDec(currentChannel);
6136  Printf("\r\n");
6137  return TRUE;
6138  }
6139 GetOutOfLoop:
6140  MacroNop();
6141  }
6142 
6143  MiApp_SetChannel(backupChannel);
6144  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.Resynning = 0;
6145  return FALSE;
6146  }
6147 
6148  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
6149  /*********************************************************************
6150  * void StartChannelHopping(BYTE OptimalChannel)
6151  *
6152  * Overview: This function broadcast the channel hopping command
6153  * and after that, change operating channel to the
6154  * input optimal channel
6155  *
6156  * PreCondition: Transceiver has been initialized
6157  *
6158  * Input: OptimalChannel - The channel to hop to
6159  *
6160  * Output:
6161  * None
6162  *
6163  * Side Effects: The operating channel for current device will change
6164  * to the specified channel
6165  *
6166  ********************************************************************/
6167  void StartChannelHopping(INPUT BYTE OptimalChannel)
6168  {
6169  BYTE i;
6170  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
6171 
6172  for( i = 0; i < FA_BROADCAST_TIME; i++)
6173  {
6174  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
6175  while(1)
6176  {
6177  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
6178  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > FA_COMM_INTERVAL )
6179  {
6180  MiApp_FlushTx();
6181  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE);
6182  MiApp_WriteData(CHANNEL_HOPPING_REQUEST);
6183  MiApp_WriteData(currentChannel);
6184  MiApp_WriteData(OptimalChannel);
6185  MultiCast(MULTICAST_TO_FFDS, FALSE);
6186  break;
6187  }
6188  }
6189  }
6190  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.ChangeChannel = 1;
6191  FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick = MiWi_TickGet();
6192  }
6193 
6194  BOOL MiApp_InitChannelHopping( INPUT DWORD ChannelMap)
6195  {
6196  BYTE RSSIValue;
6197  BYTE backupChannel = currentChannel;
6198  BYTE backupConnMode = ConnMode;
6199  BYTE i;
6200  BYTE optimalChannel;
6201  MIWI_TICK t1, t2;
6202 
6203  if( role != ROLE_PAN_COORDINATOR )
6204  {
6205  return FALSE;
6206  }
6207 
6208  for( i = 0; i < FA_BROADCAST_TIME; i++)
6209  {
6210  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
6211  while(1)
6212  {
6213  t2 = MiWi_TickGet();
6214  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t2, t1) > FA_COMM_INTERVAL )
6215  {
6216  MiApp_FlushTx();
6217  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE);
6218  MiApp_WriteData(FA_ENERGY_SCAN_REQUEST);
6219  MiApp_WriteData(ChannelMap);
6220  MiApp_WriteData(ChannelMap>>8);
6221  MiApp_WriteData(ChannelMap>>16);
6222  MiApp_WriteData(ChannelMap>>24);
6223  MultiCast(MULTICAST_TO_COORDINATORS, FALSE);
6224  break;
6225  }
6226  }
6227  }
6228 
6229  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.Val = 0;
6230  MiApp_ConnectionMode(DISABLE_ALL_CONN);
6231  MiApp_NoiseDetection(ChannelMap, 10, NOISE_DETECT_ENERGY, &RSSIValue);
6232  MiApp_SetChannel(backupChannel);
6233  MiApp_ConnectionMode(backupConnMode);
6234 
6235  FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick = MiWi_TickGet();
6236  while(1)
6237  {
6238  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
6239  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t1, FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick) > (FA_WAIT_TIMEOUT * 3) )
6240  {
6241  break;
6242  }
6243  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
6244  {
6245  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
6246  }
6247  //MiWiPROTasks();
6248  }
6249 
6250  while(1)
6251  {
6252  RSSIValue = 0xFF;
6253  optimalChannel = 0xFF;
6254  for(i = 0; i < 32; i++)
6255  {
6256  if( EnergyScanResults[i] < RSSIValue )
6257  {
6258  RSSIValue = EnergyScanResults[i];
6259  optimalChannel = i;
6260  }
6261  }
6262 
6263  if( (optimalChannel < 0xFF) && (RSSIValue < FA_MAX_NOISE_THRESHOLD) )
6264  {
6265  EnergyScanResults[optimalChannel] = 0xFF;
6266  }
6267  else
6268  {
6269  MiApp_SetChannel(backupChannel);
6270  return FALSE;
6271  }
6272 
6273  // send out FA_SUGGEST_CHANNEL command
6274  MiApp_FlushTx();
6275  MiApp_WriteData(MIWI_PRO_STACK_REPORT_TYPE);
6276  MiApp_WriteData(FA_SUGGEST_CHANNEL);
6277  MiApp_WriteData(optimalChannel);
6278  MultiCast(MULTICAST_TO_COORDINATORS, FALSE);
6279  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.DisputeChannel = 0;
6280  FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.SuggestChannel = optimalChannel;
6281 
6282  FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick = MiWi_TickGet();
6283  while(1)
6284  {
6285  t1 = MiWi_TickGet();
6286  if( MiWi_TickGetDiff(t1, FrequencyAgilityInfo.FA_StatTick) > FA_WAIT_TIMEOUT )
6287  {
6288  break;
6289  }
6290  if( FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.DisputeChannel )
6291  {
6292  break;
6293  }
6294  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
6295  {
6296  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
6297  }
6298  //MiWiPROTasks();
6299  }
6300 
6301  if( FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.DisputeChannel == 0 )
6302  {
6303  break;
6304  }
6305  }
6306 
6307  // send out FA_CHANGE_CHANNEL command
6308  StartChannelHopping(FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.SuggestChannel);
6309 
6310  while(FrequencyAgilityInfo.status.bits.ChangeChannel)
6311  {
6312  if( MiApp_MessageAvailable())
6313  {
6314  MiApp_DiscardMessage();
6315  }
6316  //MiWiPROTasks();
6317  }
6318  return TRUE;
6319  }
6320  #endif
6321 
6322  #endif
6323 
6324 
6325  #if !defined(TARGET_SMALL)
6326  /*********************************************************************
6327  * Function:
6328  * void MiApp_RemoveConnection(BYTE ConnectionIndex)
6329  *
6330  * Summary:
6331  * This function remove connection(s) in connection table
6332  *
6333  * Description:
6334  * This is the primary user interface function to disconnect connection(s).
6335  * For a P2P protocol, it simply remove the connection. For a network protocol,
6336  * if the device referred by the input parameter is the parent of the device
6337  * calling this function, the calling device will get out of network along with
6338  * its children. If the device referred by the input parameter is children of
6339  * the device calling this function, the target device will get out of network.
6340  *
6341  * PreCondition:
6342  * Transceiver has been initialized. Node has establish
6343  * one or more connections
6344  *
6345  * Parameters:
6346  * BYTE ConnectionIndex - The index of the connection in the
6347  * connection table to be removed
6348  *
6349  * Returns:
6350  * None
6351  *
6352  * Example:
6353  * <code>
6354  * MiApp_RemoveConnection(0x00);
6355  * </code>
6356  *
6357  * Remarks:
6358  * None
6359  *
6360  ********************************************************************/
6361  void MiApp_RemoveConnection(INPUT BYTE ConnectionIndex)
6362  {
6363  BYTE i;
6364 
6365  if( ConnectionIndex == 0xFF )
6366  {
6367  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
6368  {
6369  if( ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid )
6370  {
6371  if( ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isFamily )
6372  {
6373  MAC_FlushTx();
6374  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_DISASSOCIATION_NOTIFICATION);
6375  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
6376  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
6377  MTP.flags.bits.packetType = PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND;
6378  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
6379  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
6380  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
6381  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[i].PANID.Val;
6382  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].AltAddress.v;
6383  #else
6384  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
6385  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
6386  #endif
6387  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
6388  DelayMs(100);
6389  }
6390  }
6391  ConnectionTable[i].status.Val = 0;
6392  }
6393 
6394  myParent = 0xFF;
6395  myShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFF;
6396  myPANID.Val = 0xFFFF;
6397  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
6398  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 0;
6399  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
6400  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
6401  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);
6402  nvmPutMyParent(&myParent);
6403  nvmPutConnectionTable(ConnectionTable);
6404  #endif
6405  }
6406  else if( ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].status.bits.isValid )
6407  {
6408  if( ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].status.bits.isFamily && (ConnectionIndex == myParent) ) // parent
6409  {
6410  // first notify my parent
6411  MAC_FlushTx();
6412  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_DISASSOCIATION_NOTIFICATION);
6413  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
6414  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
6415  MTP.flags.bits.packetType = PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND;
6416  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
6417  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
6418  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
6419  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].PANID.Val;
6420  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.v;
6421  #else
6422  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
6423  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].Address;
6424  #endif
6425  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
6426  ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].status.Val = 0;
6427  DelayMs(100);
6428 
6429 
6430  for(i = 0; i < CONNECTION_SIZE; i++)
6431  {
6432  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
6433  if( ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isValid &&
6434  ConnectionTable[i].status.bits.isFamily && (myParent != i) ) // children
6435  {
6436  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
6437  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[i].PANID.Val;
6438  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].AltAddress.v;
6439  #else
6440  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[i].Address;
6441  #endif
6442  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
6443  DelayMs(100);
6444  }
6445  #endif
6446  ConnectionTable[i].status.Val = 0;
6447  }
6448 
6449  // get myself out of network
6450  myParent = 0xFF;
6451  myShortAddress.Val = 0xFFFF;
6452  myPANID.Val = 0xFFFF;
6453  MiMAC_SetAltAddress(myShortAddress.v, myPANID.v);
6454  MiWiPROStateMachine.bits.memberOfNetwork = 0;
6455  #if defined(ENABLE_NETWORK_FREEZER)
6456  nvmPutMyShortAddress(myShortAddress.v);
6457  nvmPutMyPANID(myPANID.v);
6458  nvmPutMyParent(&myParent);
6459  nvmPutConnectionTable(ConnectionTable);
6460  #endif
6461  }
6462  #if defined(NWK_ROLE_COORDINATOR)
6463  else if( ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].status.bits.isFamily && (ConnectionIndex != myParent) ) // child
6464  {
6465  MAC_FlushTx();
6466  MiApp_WriteData(MAC_COMMAND_DISASSOCIATION_NOTIFICATION);
6467  MTP.flags.Val = 0;
6468  MTP.flags.bits.ackReq = 1;
6469  MTP.flags.bits.packetType = PACKET_TYPE_COMMAND;
6470  #if defined(IEEE_802_15_4)
6471  MTP.altDestAddr = TRUE;
6472  MTP.altSrcAddr = TRUE;
6473  MTP.DestPANID.Val = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].PANID.Val;
6474  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].AltAddress.v;
6475  #else
6476  MTP.flags.bits.sourcePrsnt = 1;
6477  MTP.DestAddress = ConnectionTable[ConnectionIndex].Address;
6478  #endif
6479  MiMAC_SendPacket(MTP, TxBuffer, TxData);
